Maria Chona works hard to support her family. She is married and has a bakery business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy ingredients for baking like all-purpose flour, baking powder, sugar, etc..

Maria Chona has been in this business for four years now.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for baking like all-purpose flour, baking powder, sugar, etc.

loans.name: Ngern's Group

texts.en:
Ngern’s group live in a rural village in Kompong Thom province in Cambodia. Ngern makes a living cultivating rice and she also does extra work as farmer to support her family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. 

Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Xelika

texts.es:
Con tan solo 23 años la joven Xelika es madre de 2 hijos el mayor de 5 y la pequeña (ver foto), de una año de edad, a pesar de su juventud es una mujer muy madura y responsable que no se dejó agobiar por las difíciles situaciones, por el contrario, busco una manera de salir adelante, junto un pequeño capital, prestó dinero e inicio con la venta de abarrotes y víveres, una vez consolido su negocio busco alternativas para aumentar sus ingresos pues quería darles educación y una mejor alimentación, monto un negocio complementario que es la cría de cerdos.

La joven Xelika se ha sacrificado enormemente por su familia, por pagarle una educación, mejorar sus condiciones, por tener un futuro. 

Xelika quiere solicitar un préstamo para incentivar y mejorar sus dos actividades que aunque suponen un aumento de carga laboral, la aguantara y está dispuesta a asumir esta labor ya que de esto dependen mucho sus hijos.

Solicita un préstamo para la compra de granos, abarrotes, harina de engorde para los cerdos y mejoras locativas en su negocio y en los chiqueros.
texts.en:
At only 23 years old, Xelika is the mother of 2 children. The older one is 5 and the younger one is 1 (see photo). Despite her young age, she is a very mature and responsible woman who didn't get overwhelmed by difficult situations. On the contrary, she searched for a way to get ahead. Along with a small amount of capital, she borrowed some money and started selling groceries. Once she consolidated her business, she searched for additional ways to increase her income, since she wanted to give her children an education and better nutrition. She started up a second business raising pigs.

Young Xelika has sacrificed enormously for her family to pay for their education, improve their living conditions, and give them a future.

Xelika would like to request a loan to stimulate and improve her two businesses which, although this will mean an increase in workload, she is ready to take it on since her children depend a lot on this work.

She is requesting a loan to buy grains, groceries, and fattening feed for the pigs, as well as to make some improvements to her business and to her pigsties.

loans.use: to stock her grocery store, and buy pigs which is her secondary business.

loans.name: Meybi Antonio

texts.es:
Meybi, de 30 años de edad, es un joven muy trabajador, está casado, tiene 2 hijos.

Meybi, desde la edad de 12 años trabaja en fincas cafetaleras, de donde ha podido ayudar siempre económicamente a sus padres; pero también trabaja como vigilante en una cooperativa de cafetaleros, de donde obtiene los ingresos para ayudar a su familia, trabaja 2 días y descansa 2 días también y en sus días libres aprovecha para trabajar en las fincas; se levanta a las 3 de la mañana para prepararse y caminar hasta el lugar donde trabaja y regresa a las 2 de la tarde, el trabajo es muy pesado, pero lo hace para que no le falte nada a su familia; también tiene cultivados 7,000 metros cuadrados de cafetal.

Meybi, necesita el crédito para comprar abono, pesticidas y fertilizantes para su cafetal, porque hace unos años sus cultivos se dañaron debido a una plaga y él ha luchado con recuperarlo pero se le hace difícil pues tiene que invertir y hasta 3 años después obtiene la cosecha.

Sus sueños son, poder tener un excelente cultivo y que sus hijos estudien y tengan un mejor porvenir.
texts.en:
Meybi is 30 years old and is a hardworking young man. He is married and has two children. 

Meybi has been working in coffee plantations since he was 12 years old which has allowed him to always help his parents financially. He also works as a watchman in a coffee grower cooperative where he obtains the income to help his family. He works two days and rests two days. He takes advantage of his days off to work on the plantations. He wakes up at three in the morning to get ready and to walk to work and he returns at two in the afternoon. The work is hard but he does it so that his family won't lack anything. He also has 7,000 square meters of coffee. 

Meybi needs this loan to buy manure, pesticides and fertilizers for his coffee plantation because a few years ago his crop was damaged due to a plague. He has been working hard to recover his crop but it has been difficult because he has to invest and wait three years for the harvest. His dreams are to have an excellent crop and that his children will study and have a better future.

loans.use: to buy manure, pesticides and fertilizers.

loans.name: Yesmin

texts.es: Yesmin es una Cartagenera con una gran capacidad de autogestión y liderazgo, hace 10 años y después de haber sido toda su vida empleada en una organización del estado, decidió iniciar su propio negocio en compañía de una hermana, ellas elaboraban fritos de maíz; caramañolas, empanadas, arepas de huevo y patacones.  Tiempo después se independizo y continuó con este negocio el cual atiende a partir de las 6 a.m. hasta las 9 a.m., así mismo vende los fines de semana comidas rápidas por las noches  y oferta a sus clientes productos por catálogo.   En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo para invertir en víveres; aceites, harina, carnes, huevos, frutas y vajillas.  Su meta a futuro es incrementar sus ingresos para aportar más a su hogar y realizarle adecuaciones a su vivienda.
texts.en:
Yesmin is a woman from Cartagena with a great capacity for self-management and leadership, 10 years ago, after spending her whole life employed by the state, she decided to start her own business in partnership with a sister; they made corn cakes, caramañolas [a type of fried meat pie], empanadas, arepas [flatbreads] filled with egg and plantain chips.  Some time later she went independent and continued with this business, which she looks after from 6am to 9am.  Likewise on weekends she sells fast food at night and also sells catalogue goods to her customers.  

At the moment she is applying for a credikiva, the first funding request she has made to the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo [Mario Santo Domingo Foundation] to invest in supplies; olives, flour, meat, eggs, fruit and dishware.  Her objective is to increase her income to contribute more to her household and make improvements on her home.

loans.use: to buy supplies; olives, flour, meat, eggs, fruit and dishware.

loans.name: Ter's Group

texts.en:
Ter’s group live in a rural village in Kompong Thom province in Cambodia. Ter does work as farmer to support her family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. 

Having a water filter at home will help each of these woman and men to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Clorinda Matto De Turner Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “CLORINDA MATTO DE TURNER”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Calca, perteneciente a la provincia de Calca y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Grimaneza ella es conviviente y tiene 34 años; La socia trabaja en su negocio de tienda de abarrotes, la socia vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar, leche y aceite, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,la socia es uan persona trabajadora y luchadora que por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a su familia, la socia ya tiene 5 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar leche, azúcar, aceite y arroz.

Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de jugos, negocio de venta de ropa, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de restaurant.



La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These borrowers belong to the “CLORINDA MATTO DE TURNER” communal bank. This bank is located in the district of Calca, which belongs to the province of Calca and department of Cuzco.

Grimaneza is in a common law marriage and she is 34 years old. She works in her grocery store business, selling staple products such as rice, milk, and oil. She works from 8:00 a.m until 6:00 p.m. She is a hardworking person and a fighter who gets her family ahead through her business. She has had this business for 5 years and it is going very well for her. Her dream is to expand the grocery business. She is asking for the loan to buy milk, sugar, oil and rice.

The other members have businesses selling juice, selling clothes, a grocery store and a restaurant. 

She thanks the people who are a part of this dream in this way and she is committed to making her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy milk, sugar, oil and rice.

loans.name: I Love The Sea -N5Tânlộchlộc Group

texts.en:
Mrs Lựu, a 28-year-old married woman, lives in  a  rural town in Hau Loc district, Thanh Hoa province. She has worked in marine aquaculture raising scallops for four years. Her main hardship is lack of capital.  
 
In 2013, Lựu joined Thanh Hoa Microfinance Institution to improve her  business. She has repaid her two previous loans. A reputable person in the community. Lựu and three others established the loan group "I love the sea -N5TânLộcHLộc" to get loans and share their business experiences in order to secure  a better life. 

Lựu is requesting a loan to purchase supplies to raise scallops to sell in the future. With her profits, Lựu hopes that she will maintain a successful business, that her family will be healthy and happy, and that her children will do well in school.

loans.use: to purchase suppiles to raise scallops to sell in the future

loans.name: Regina

texts.en:
Regina is 47 years old and she comes from the province of Silang, Cavite, Philippines. She is happily married to Pablito, her business partner. Raising seven children is their biggest challenge but with their faith in God and diligence they have raised them well. Five of them are already working, one is still in high school and the youngest is still in elementary school.

Regina is grateful that God has blessed her with a general store and eatery business for a number of years already. It has been her stable source of income to support her family. She buys essential food items such as canned goods, coffee, biscuits, beverages and toiletries from a wholesaler and sells them at retail price. Aside from her small store she also has a small eatery that sells simple snacks. Although some customers can not fulfill their obligation to pay she has already established a quite number of customers who are loyal to her and pay her on time.

She is now humbly asking for a 40,000 PHP loan to buy large quantities of grocery items, mostly food items, to better serve the needs in her community. She will use part of the loan to buy ingredients like fresh meat, vegetables and condiments to cook meals for her small eatery. She is thanking God and you in advance for your good heart and the financial aid that will be given to her. Her earnings are a big help to cover her daily needs and to send her children to school.

Regina's simple dream is to grow her store. She prays that her children will always be obedient. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies. 

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to buy grocery items, beverages and toiletries to sell.

loans.name: Narcisa

texts.en:
Narcisa is a hardworking entrepreneur with three children. She runs a general store in the Philippines.

Narcisa has requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell such as soap, milk, sugar, eggs, chips, etc.

She is very industrious and earns additional income by selling other things such as pre-paid mobile services.

Narcisa dreams that one day she will be able to save enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell such as soap, milk, sugar, eggs, chips, etc.

loans.name: Maria Sonia

texts.es:
Maria, está casada, vive con su esposo, quien se dedica a la albañileria, una de sus hijas de 27 años de edad, es quien le ayuda con los oficios del hogar y su nieto de 6 años de edad vive con ellos desde era un bebe, porque su madre emigro fuera del pais.

Maria, se dedica a la crianza de pollos de engorde, a pesar de que ella no tiene mucha experencia en cuanto a la crianza de animales, está muy entusiasmada por cuidar de los que va adquirir y pone todo su esfuerzo y practica todo lo que sabe a cerca de alimentarlos, arreglar el lugar para poder criarlos y estar pendiente de sus vacunas para mantenerlos sanos.

El crédito le servira para comprar pollos de engorde pequeños y cuando esten gordos los vendera y de su ganancia volvera a invertir para la compra de más pollos.

Ella sueña con tener una granja con muchos animalitos y que su nieto le ayude a cuidarlos, para que aprenda el valor del trabajo y sea un muchacho responsable y con vision de responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Maria is married and lives with her husband, who is a bricklayer. One of her daughters, who is 27 years old, is the one who helps her with the household duties, and her 6-year-old grandson has lived with them since he was a baby because his mother emigrated outside the country.

Maria raises broiler chickens. Despite not having much experience with raising animals, she is very enthusiastic about caring for the ones she is going to acquire, and she applies all of her effort and practices everything she knows about feeding them, arranging the place in order to be able to raise them, and staying on top of their vaccines to keep them healthy.

The loan will help her to buy small broiler chickens, and when they are fattened she will sell them. With her profits she will again invest in buying more chickens.

She dreams of having a farm with many little animals and that her grandson will help her to care for them, so that he learns the value of work and will be a responsible boy with a view of responsibility.

loans.use: to buy small broiler chickens and when they are fattened she will sell them

loans.name: Maria Encarnacion

texts.es:
María es una joven de 19 años de edad es ecuatoriana, actualmente se encuentra soltera vive en casa de su madre, gracias al esfuerzo y sacrificio de sus padres pudo terminar la primaria y desde muy joven ha trabajado muy duro para poder ayudar a su madre y hermanos, juntos viven en un sector extremadamente rural conocido como Laipo Grande, este sector está ubicado en una zona muy alta de la ciudad de Latacunga perteneciente a la provincia de Cotopaxi República del Ecuador.
María actualmente tiene su tienda de abarrotes le va muy bien y desea sutirla con nuevos porductos para fidelizar los clientes del sector, pues María pese a su corta edad nunca ha tenido la oportunidad de que alguna persona o institución le puedan ayudar con financiamiento para realizar su sueño, hoy en día María le ha dado mucho gusto el que Kiva le brinde la oportunidad de hacer crecer su negocio, ella solicita el crédito para comprar más mercadería e incrementar sus ingresos. María y su madre desean Kiva por hacer posible el crecimiento en su vida laboral ya que por fin podrá emprender su negocio y salir adelante juntas.
texts.en:
María is a 19-year-old young woman. She is Ecuadorian and currently is single. She lives in her mother's house. Thanks to the efforts and sacrifice of her parents, she was able to finish primary school and since she was very young she has worked very hard to be able to help her mother and siblings. Together, they live in an extremely rural sector known as Laipo Grande. This sector is located in a very high zone of the city of Latacunga, which belongs to the province of Cotopaxi in the Republic of Ecuador. 

Currently, María has a grocery store which is going very well for her and she wants to stock it with new products to gain the loyalty of the customers in the area, since María, despite her young age has never had the opportunity of having someone or an institution that can help her with funding to realize her dream. Today, María is very happy that Kiva offers her the opportunity to grow her business. She is asking for the loan to purchase more merchandise and increase her revenue. María and her mother want to thank Kiva for making the growth of their work life possible since with the end they will be able to undertake their business and get ahead together.

loans.use: to purchase more merchandise and stock her products, so to help her mother with the expenses and get ahead.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy pandan leaves, dye and grocery items for consumption like noodles, canned goods, eggs, and rice

loans.name: Zulma Alvertina

texts.es: La señora Zulma tiene 31 años de edad, tiene una hija en edad escolar, la cual todavía se encuentra a su cargo. Desde hace más de 10 años que se dedica a los tejidos de prenda de punto, obteniendo gran éxito por el estilo y calidad de su prendas,  la señora nos indica que quiere tener mejores ingresos económicos para salir adelante; la señora está consolidando la ampliación de su taller de trabajo, es por esto que la señora requiere un préstamos para la compra de maquinaria para tejidos y compra de lanas e hilos para seguir con su actividad, brindando así a la señora Zulma la oportunidad de agrandar su taller. Además la señora nos cuenta que quiere mejorar la calidad de vida, así como generar nuevas fuentes de empleo para mujeres que tengan la habilidad de tejido a punto, como así también desarrollarse en el ámbito laboral.
texts.en: Zulma is 31 years old and has a school-aged daughter who she is still responsible for. For more than 10 years she has been making knitwear fabrics and having great success because of the style and quality of her clothing. She says that she wants to have greater financial income to get ahead. She is funding the expansion of her workshop so she needs the loan to buy knitting machinery and buy wool and thread to continue with her business and allowing Zulma the opportunity to expand her workshop. She also said that she wants to improve her quality of life as well as generate new sources of employment for women who can knit so they can move forward in the labor market.

loans.use: to buy knitting machinery and buy wool and thread to continue with her business and improve her family's income.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more stock of dried fish

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es:
La señora Margarita,  tiene 61 años de edad, recientemente murió su esposo no tiene hijos dependientes de su ingreso, vive en una comunidad rural y muy alejada al área urbano.
La señora Margarita, se dedica a la agricultura desde muy joven. Este año sus cultivos de cebolla fueron afectados por una enfermedad a causa de las constantes lluvias que le echaron a perder sus cultivos de cebolla, también perdió sus almácigos de cebolla quedándose sin semilla para plantar. La comunidad entera sufrió los daños. 
Por estos motivos mencionados su estabilidad económica ha sufrido un desequilibrio, afectando directamente en la adquisición de sus insumos agrícolas que se requieren para la producción y para la alimentación y sustencion de su persona. La Señora Margarita, es una persona respetada en la comunidad donde trabaja, por lo dedicado al trabajo agrícola, con  lo cual lucha día a día por salir adelante. 
La señora Margarita, está solicitando el préstamo para comprar semilla de cebolla, abonos y medicamentos para curar sus cultivos de cebolla de esta manera mejorar su economía y calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Margarita is 61 years old. Her husband recently died and she does not have any children who are dependent upon her income. She lives in a rural community that is very far from the urban area.

Margarita has worked in agriculture since she was very young. This year, her onion crops were affected by an illness caused by the constant rains that spoiled her crops. She also lost her onion seedlings and was left without seeds to plant. The entire community suffered the damages.

For these reasons, her economic stability has suffered an imbalance, directly affecting the purchase of the agricultural supplies that she needs for production as well as for her personal source of nourishment and sustenance. Margarita is a respected person in the community where she works for her dedication to agricultural work with which she fights each day to get ahead.

Margarita is asking for a loan to purchase onion seeds, fertilizers and medicines to cure her onion crops and thus improve her finances and quality of life.

loans.use: to buy onion seed, fertilizers and medicine to cure her onion crop and improve her finances and quality of life.

loans.name: Anna Marie

texts.en:
Anna Marie is 31 years old and lives in Dasmarinas, Cavite, Philippines. She is married to Orlando, a construction worker, and has four children. She has been employed as a sewer in a garment factory in Cavite for three years now through the help of the CCT Covenant Community Service Cooperative.* 

As a sewer she designs, makes, pieces together or adjusts and repairs clothes for customers. She works as a member of the assembly line in a factory. Her primary duty is to cut and trim clothes and stitch clothes or pieces of clothes together. Factory workers in the Philippines earn only the minimum wage, which sadly is not enough to raise a family of four schooling children.  Anna Marie thought of putting up a small general store to augment their income and help meet their daily personal needs.

Therefore Anna Marie is humbly asking for a 8,000 PHP loan to infuse grocery items into her store. She wants to make sure that she has the essential food items to offer. She is thanking you in advance for helping her sustain her store. Her family is her top priority, and she would like to provide her children with a good education.

Anna Marie meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work. CCT staff and volunteers conduct weekly fellowship meetings for the factory workers before their work routine to do Bible readings, prayer and discipleship sessions to encourage and inspire them to do their best in life. 

* The Covenant Community Service Cooperative works to provide local communities with a labor force trained and equipped with the skills required for deployment in construction and site development projects. The cooperative prepares its members to acquire these skills, quality for jobs, cultivate savings consciousness, and provide decent shelter, food, and education for their families. Its core programs are the following: Professional Staff Services Program, Workers Guild Development Program, Enterprise Development Program, and Consultancy Services.

loans.use: to add some grocery items to her small general store.

loans.name: Maria Jose

texts.es:
María José es una joven ecuatoriana tiene 21 años, está actualmente viviendo en unión libre, nació en Arenillas, no tiene hijos y vive en esta ciudad ya varios años junto a su pareja sentimental, por falta de recursos económicos no pudo culminar sus estudios universitarios. Por la situación económica que no fue buena tuvo que trabajar para ser apoyo a su esposo, viven en la ciudad de Latacunga ubicado en la Provincia de Cotopaxi en la República del Ecuador, en un departamento arrendado, desde hace mucho tiempo atrás.
María José es una mujer muy emprendedora, trabajadora y muy dedicada a su hogar, actualmente trabaja como mesera en un restaurante muy conocido en la ciudad, lamentablemente no es un trabajo estable, es por eso que  María José  decidió ponerse un pequeño negocio de compra y venta de ropa para damas, caballeros y niños, con esto ha podido solventar sus gastos y los de su hogar siendo ella un gran apoyo para su esposo, para lo cual solicita un crédito que lo utilizará en la compra de mercadería, con esto  María José y su familia podrán  mejorar su estilo de vida. 
Ella agradece a Kiva por hacer posible el crecimiento en su vida laboral y personal.
texts.en:
María José is a young 21-year-old Ecuadorian. She is currently living in a common law marriage. She was born in Arenillas, she has no children and has lived in this city for several years now together with her romantic partner. Due to lack of financial resources she was unable to finish her university studies. Because of the poor economic situation, she had to work in order to support her husband. A while back they lived in Latacunga city, located in Cotopaxi Provence in the Republic of Ecuador, in a rented apartment.

María José is a very entrepreneurial woman, a hard worker, and very devoted to her home. Currently she works as a waitress in a very well-known restaurant in her city. Unfortunately it is not stable work. It is for this reason that María José decided to get into a small business purchasing and selling clothes for ladies, gentlemen and children. With this, she had been able to meet her expenses and those of her household. She is a great supporter of her husband, for which she requests a loan that she will utilize in the purchase of merchandise. With this, María José and her family can improve their lifestyle.

She is grateful to Kiva for making growth possible in her professional and personal life.

loans.use: to start her clothing sales business so that she will grow together with her husband and improve her quality of life.

loans.name: Emelia

texts.en:
Emelia is 49 years old and has nine children. Emelia is married and three of her children are currently in school.

Emelia is in the agricultural business, raising chickens in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 17,000 loan through NWTF to purchase feed and vitamins for her chickens. Emelia has been raising chickens for 5 years now, and has borrowed 12 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Emelia would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase feed and vitamins for her chickens.

loans.name: Roquesa

texts.en:
Roquesa works hard to support her family. Roquesa is a widow and has a buy-and-sell used clothing business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 45 years now.

She requested a PHP 30,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional bundles of used clothes to sell.

In the future, Roquesa would like to save money to build a house for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional bundles of used clothes to sell.

loans.name: Deni

texts.en:
Good day, lenders! This is Deni, one of Ruma agents. Deni lives in Sumedang, located about four hour’s drive from Jakarta, the capital city of Indonesia. Deni is a teacher in his local community and right now he also sells mobile airtime credits and provides bill payment services (like electricity, water, etc) for his community. Deni is a young guy who has a really big spirit to become an entrepreneur. He decided to join Ruma because he wants to learn to become an entrepreneur, as well as give more contribution to his community. 

With assistance and support from Ruma’s staff, Deni sees improvements in his business. As the business grows, he is hoping to get a working capital loan from Kiva. He will use the loan to provide more mobile payment services for his community. Having known about the importance, your loan will be very useful to help Deni improves his business and accordingly, his community who needs access to such services. 

Deni is the one who is seen in the photo. He is very thankful for your kind support.

loans.use: to process more prepaid mobile airtime purchases and utility bill payments (like electricity, water, etc) for members of his local community.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cement and other products for their sale.

loans.name: San Lorenzo Group

texts.es:
El comité está conformado por mujeres inspiradas en una mejor y buena calidad de vida. Las Integrantes se encuentran contentas por formar parte del comité por contar con una oportunidad de poder trabajar y generar sus propios ingresos.
La Sra. Epifania se dedica a la venta de queso y leche, es una mujer muy trabajadora que poco a poco se ha abierto camino y comenta que hoy dia ya tiene muy buena clientela. Ella es una mujer que quiere salir adelante, es por ello que pone todo de si para poder crecer.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar leche y queso en cantidad, para poder seguir con sus ventas, y cumplir de esa forma con sus clientes como lo viene haciendo.
En la foto del grupo hay 18 mujeres ya que el grupo tiene 18 miembros, pero solo 17 personas piden de este préstamo en este ciclo.
texts.en:
The committee is formed of women inspired for a better and good quality of life. The members are happy to be part of the committee to have an opportunity to be able to work and generate their own income.

Epifania works selling cheese and milk. She is a very hard-working woman who, little by little, has made her way and says that these days she has a very good customer base. She is a woman who wants to get ahead, for this she puts her all into being able to grow. 

She asks for this loan to be able to purchase milk and cheese in large quantities to be able to continue with her sales and, in this way, satisfy her customers as she has been doing.

In the photo there are 18 women since the group has 18 members, but only 17 people ask for a loan in this loan cycle.

loans.use: to purchase milk and cheese to sell.

loans.name: San Jose Group

texts.es:
El comité San Jose, se encuentra en el ciclo 12, es un grupo muy unido que se acoplaron para poder trabajar y salir adelante por medio del trabajo en conjunto de todas.
Se puede comentar la vida de la señora  Pelagia ellas se dedica a la venta de gallinas caseras, ropas, cosméticos y colchas, es una persona muy trabajadora, hace todo tipo de trabajos como medios para poder obtener los medios para poder ayudar a su familia y a sus seres queridos. Ella siempre participa de una manera muy activa en las capacitaciones, y de esa forma busca mejorar sus condiciones de vida y aplicar lo que va aprendiendo a sus microemprendimientos.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar prendas variadas y cosméticos para la venta, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus ventas como lo viene haciendo. Ella agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder mejorar cada día, y por medio de su trabajo ayudar a sus seres queridos.
texts.en: The San José committee is in its 12th cycle. It is a very united group that got together to work and forge ahead through working together. The life of Pelagia will be highlighted. She is dedicated to the sale of free range chickens, clothing, cosmetics, and quilts. She is a very hard-working person, doing all types of jobs as a way to obtain means to help her family and her loved ones. She always participates in a very active way in training workshops, and seeks to improve her living conditions and apply what she is learning to her small business. She requests this loan to buy various articles of clothing and cosmetics to sell so that she can continue with her sales as she has been doing. She is grateful for the opportunity to improve every day, and through her work, to help her loved ones.

loans.use: to buy various articles of clothing and cosmetics to sell.

loans.name: Norma

texts.es:
Norma está cursando el tercer  año   de la carrera de Derecho, ella quiere ser una abogada que pueda ayudar a las demás personas por medio de sus conocimientos.
Norma está poniendo todo de sí para poder ser alguien en la vida, e ir abriéndose camino por medio de sus esfuerzos.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar una notebook para poder hacer sus trabajos de la universidad.
texts.en:
Norma is a third year Law student. She wants to be a lawyer and help others through her knowledge. 
Norma is giving her all to be able to be someone in life, and forge a path through her efforts.
She is requesting this loan to buy a Notebook so she can do her college assignments.

loans.use: To buy a Notebook.

loans.name: Eugenia

texts.es:
Eugenia es una mujer de 62 años de edad, soltera con hijos de 23 y 35 años, y su negocio es la elaboración y venta de tortas y pasteles. 
Ella es buena madre, independiente, comprensiva, paciente, responsable y muy trabajadora. Su trabajo lo realiza en el barrio ‘8 de septiembre’ un área céntrica y comercial, edificios de oficinas públicas y privadas conviven lado a lado. De clima cálido sub tropical con una temperatura que varía durante el día entre 21-35 grados centígrados.
Eugenia es de tez trigueña, cabello negro largo lo usa amarrado, ojos obscuros, baja estatura, complexión física robusta, su lengua materna es el Guaraní que habla en familia y habla español por cultura general y por el comercio que realiza. Su vida la comparte con sus hijos que son independientes y trabajan, viven en una casa propia construida de madera con techo de calamina y piso de tierra que cuenta con agua potable, energía eléctrica y alcantarillado. Su negocio es el horneado y venta de tortas y postres, actividad que comenzó desde su casa, haciendo una mínima inversión con la venta de alfajores, queques de vainilla y tortas de chocolates que llevan insumos fáciles de encontrar en el mercado, a medida que recuperaba su capital, invertía en la oferta de postres para el público. “las tortas y postres son antojos difíciles de negar y es esa dificultad que hace de mi negocio un éxito…” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es que cuenta con ventas diarias y constantes, la desventaja es la falta de un techo para dejar de hornear al aire libre y trabajar en mejores condiciones. Su sueño es ahorrar para comprar un horno nuevo y mejorar sus ventas, ella desea realizar la construcción de un techo para su horno para dejar de hornear al aire libre. Esta es la 7 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 12 años que viene realizando esta actividad. 
Es por esos motivos que Eugenia solicita un préstamo para la construcción de un techo para su horno para dejar de hornear al aire libre y mejorar sus panes.
texts.en:
Eugenia, 62, is single and has two children: 23 and 35 years old.  She has a food business, making and selling cakes and other pastries.  She is a good mom, self-reliant, responsible and very hard-working.  She operates her business in the 8 de Septiembre neighborhood of Santa Cruz, a commercial area near the center of the city.  The climate is sub-tropical and day-time temperatures range from 21- to 35-degrees, Centigrade.

Eugenia has dark eyes and long, dark hair that she wears tied in the back.  She speaks Guaraní, her native language, and Spanish.  Her children work and the family lives in a house that they own.  The house was built of wood and has a metal roof and dirt floor.  The house is plumbed and has running water and electricity.  

Eugenia has made and sold cakes and other pastries for 12 years.  She operates the business in a space in her house and began by making alfajores, vanilla cakes and other pastries that required few ingredients and minimum start-up costs.  She expanded the business later, after she built up a bit of capital.  "It's hard to pass up on cakes and pastries", she says, "and that's what's made my business a success".  She likes the business because no matter the day, she knows some customers will come to buy from her.  

Delia is applying for a loan, her seventh, that she will use to build a roof over what is now an outside cooking area.

loans.use: to build a roof over her cooking area.

loans.name: Caminando Juntos Group

texts.es: Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “CAMINANDO JUNTOS”; Este banco se ubicado en la provincia de La Convención, distrito de Echarate perteneciente al departamento de Cusco. La socia Livia continúa dedicándose al cultivo de frutas como plátanos, naranjas entre otros , la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, la socia continua vendiendo la fruta a sus clientes que le solicitan, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia. La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes entre otros. Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de crianza de animales menores, cultivo de frutas, agricultura. Los socios en general agradecen el crédito otorgado y por este medio y se comprometen a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido. El socio que sale adjunto a la foto pidio permiso para llegar tarde a la reunion por motivos de trabajo.
texts.en: These are the members of the “CAMINANDO JUNTOS” communal bank, which is to be found in the province of La Convención, in the district of Echarate which forms part of Cusco department. The featured member, Livia, still grows fruit such as bananas, oranges, etc. which she sells to customers who request them. She is a responsible and diligent person who wants to go on working like this to support her family. She is seeking the loan to buy seeds and fertiliser, among other things. The other group members breed and sell small animals, grow fruit or work in agriculture. They are all grateful for the help which they receive and guarantee that they will repay their loans on time. The member in the separate photo asked permission to arrive late due to work commitments.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertiliser, among other things.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy feed and piglets

loans.name: Nueva Vision De Rumichaca Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “NUEVA VISION DE RUMICHACA”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Senaida ella es conviviente y tiene 21 años y tiene 1 hijo; La socia trabaja en su negocio de venta de cereales, la socia vende maiz, trigo y quinua, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m, la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien,la socia por medio de este negocio la socia quiere sacar adelante a sus hijos, el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender los cereales. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar trigo, maíz y quinua.

Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de cereales, negocio de venta de ropa, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de restaurant.



La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members belong to the "New Vision of Rumichaca" communal bank. This bank is located in the district of Urubamba in the province of Urubamba in the department of Cusco.

Senaida is in a relationship and is 21 years old. She has 1 son. She works at her business selling grain. She sells corn, wheat, and quinoa. She works from 8:00 a.m. until 5:00 p.m. She has already been in this business for several years and it is going very well for her. She wants to move her children forward with this business. Her dream is to have a store where she can sell the grain. She is asking for the loan in order to buy wheat, corn, and quinoa.

The other members sell grain, sell clothing, have a grocery store, and have a restaurant.

She thanks those who are a part of this dream through this medium and she promises to make her repayments within the established time period.

loans.use: to buy wheat, corn, and quinoa

loans.name: Raúl

texts.es:
Raúl es un hombre que trabaja con mucho esfuerzo y optimismo para generar el sustento diario para su familia; que se compone de ocho hijos y su esposa. Raúl tiene 49 años de edad.

 Él trabaja como agricultor y albañil en las comunidades más concurridas de Sololá; él expresa que se dedica a esta actividad porque es una forma honesta de ganarse la vida y generar los ingresos económicos para brindarle los servicios básicos a su querida familia. Tiene más de quince años de dedicarse a esta labor y está muy contento con ello.
 Raúl ama a su familia y desea darles lo mejor, es por ello que solicita un préstamo para la compra de materiales de construcción como cemento, cal, arena para su vivienda.

Su mayor sueño es construir su vivienda y así darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Raul is a man who works with a lot of effort and optimism to create a livelihood for his family. His family is Comprised of eight children and his wife. Raul is 49 years old.

He works as a farmer and mason in the busiest communities of Sololá.  He says that he does this because it is an honest way to make a living and generate income to provide basic necessities to his beloved family. He has more than fifteen years devoted to this work and is very happy with it.
  
Raul loves his family and wishes to give them the best, which is why he is applying for a loan for the purchase construction materials such as cement, lime, sand for their home.

His biggest dream is to build a home and to give a better quality of life to his family.

loans.use: to buy building materials such as cement, lime and sand.

loans.name: Claudia Marilu

texts.es: Claudia, madre soltera, tiene sus 2 hijos de 4 y 6 años de edad, Claudia se dedica al jornal de trabajos de agricultura y de también se dedica a la crianza de animales menores, Claudia comenta que es muy duro sacar adelante a sus hijos sin el apoyo del papa de los niños. Claudia solicita el dinero del crédito para comprar chanchos ya que este es su negocio  que le genera ingresos económicos para cubrir las necesidades de sus hijos. Claudia tiene la esperanza de seguir adelante en su negocio y a futuro comprar su propia casa que le permita mejorar la calidad de vida a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Claudia is the single mother of two children, ages 4 and 6 years. Claudia is a farmer and she also raises small animals. She commented that it's very hard to raise her children well without the support of their father. Claudia is requesting this loan so that she can buy pigs, which is her business; this will generate enough income to cover her children's needs. 

Claudio hopes to get ahead in her business and one day buy her own home, which will improve her children's quality of life.

loans.use: To buy pigs

loans.name: Gloria Argentina

texts.es:
Gloria tiene 63 años de edad es madre soltera de 6 hijos, durante toda su vida se ha dedicado a la producción de café, hace unos 5 años que tiene certificado su café con el sello de  comercio justo y Rain Forest la comercialización la hace atreves de la Cooperativa COCAFCAL de la cual es socia, Ella cuenta que su mayor sueño es poder ver a todos sus hijos superados y con buenas oportunidades para tener una vida digna.
En  los últimos años La producción de café orgánico a tomado importancia en la región ya que brinda mejores mercados para el café además de contribuir para hacer los cafetales mas sostenibles y productivos, es por esas razones que Gloria quiere convertir sus cafetales a producción orgánica.
Gloria solicita un crédito para llevar a cabo el proceso de certificación orgánica con plantaciones nuevas, con Con las ganancias obtenidas por el café orgánico vendido Gloria espera poder cubrir los gastos de su familia.
Un crédito ayudara a Gloria a Tener mejores precios por su café además de hacer su cultivo más amigable con el medio ambiente y brindarle ingresos extras para mejorar la vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Gloria is 63 years old. She is the single mother of 6 children, and for her whole life she has worked growing coffee. For some 5 years, she has certified her coffee with the fair trade and Rain Forest seals. She sells through the COCAFCAL cooperative, of which she is a member. She says that her greatest dream is to be able to see all of her children improved and with good opportunities to have a dignified life.

In the last few years, organic coffee production has become important in the region since it offers better markets for the coffee in addition to contributing to make the coffee plantations more sustainable and productive. For these reasons, Gloria wants to convert her coffee crop to organic production.

Gloria asks for a loan to carry out the process of organic certification with new plants. With the earnings she gets for the organic coffee she sells, Gloria expects to be able to cover the family's expenses. 

A loan will help Gloria to have better prices for her coffee in addition to making her crop more environmentally friendly and offer extra income to improve her family's life.

loans.use: to purchase organic fertilizer, organic pesticides, coffee plants and other materials needed to convert her coffee crop to organic.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine and a variety of stitching materials  for her own stitching work

loans.name: Barbara

texts.en:
Barbara is a single woman she is 37 years old and she is working as a cook at a restaurant.

 Barbara needs another loan to buy groceries because she wants to open her own restaurant Barbara went to cooking classes, so she knows what to do. She hopes you can help her because she is ready to work harder.  She supports her parents and is living with them

loans.use: to buy groceries to open a restaurant

loans.name: Kuña Pora Group

texts.es:
El grupo Kuña Pora está dentro del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, son mujeres jefas de familia que luchan para poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida y dar a sus seres queridos todo lo que ella no pudo tener.
Una de las integrantes es la Señora Vicenta quien tiene un negocio bien surtido, el cual es un kiosko bien completo que con mucho esfuerzo ha podido crecer y salir adelante. Con sacrificio está mejorando y lucha por poder dar a su familia todo lo que no pudo tener.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar insumos varios y surtir su local con comestibles, bebidas, golosinas, y otros, de manera a poder seguir con sus ventas, luchando por poder mejorar.
Hay personas de mas en la foto ya que el grupo tiene 18 integrantes, pero en este ciclo solo 16 de ellas piden este préstamo, las otras dos solo integran como ayudantes.
texts.en:
The Kuña Pora group is participating in the poverty elimination program. Its members are women, who are heads of their households and who strive to improve their living conditions and give their loved ones everything they couldn't have.

Vicenta is one of the group's members. She has a well-stocked refreshments stand. Through her hard work, she has managed to grow her business and get ahead. By making a lot of sacrifices, she has been improving her situation. She works hard to give her family everything she couldn't have.

She is requesting this loan to buy different items and stock up her stand with food, beverages, snacks, and other products so that she will be able to continue with her sales while she works hard to better herself.  

(There are two extra people in the photo because the group originally had 18 members, but during this loan cycle, only 16 have asked for a loan)

loans.use: to buy food, beverages, snacks, and other products.

loans.name: Nargis

texts.ru: Наргис целенаправленная и честная женщина. Ей 41 год и у нее подрастает один ребенок. Так получилось, что Наргис развелась с мужем. Однако это ее не сломило. Она, открыв свой собственный магазин, начала продавать там разные материалы, парфюмерию и другую продукцию. Наргис занимается этим бизнесом на протяжении 6 лет. Начиная с  маленького бизнеса, она со временем смогла расширить его. Наргис очень вежливо обращается с клиентами, всегда дает им хорошую консультацию по выбору той или иной продукции. В данный момент у неё осталось мало товара в магазине, и ей нужно закупить новую партию товаров, таких как парфюмерия, материалы, бытовую химию и т. д. К сожалению, у Наргис  недостаточно денег. Ей не хватает ещё 900 USD. Наргис надеется на Вашу поддержку и заранее благодарит Вас за вашу доброту.
texts.en: Nargis is an ambitious and honest woman. She is 41 years old and has one child who is growing up. It came about that Nargis got divorced. However, this did not break her. Having opened her own shop, she began selling various fabrics, perfumes and other items. Nargis has been running this business for six years. Starting with a small business, she was able to expand it over time. Nargis treats her customers very politely and always gives them good advice on choosing one or another product. At the present time little stock remains in her store, and she needs to buy a new batch of goods such as perfumes, fabrics, household chemicals and so on. Unfortunately, Nargis does not have enough money. She needs another $900 USD. Nargis hopes for your support and thanks you in advance for your kindness.

loans.use: to purchase fabrics, perfume and other goods to sell.

loans.name: Zulfiya

texts.en: Zulfiya is a generous woman. She was born in the southern part of Tajikistan in 1993. She is living in a remote district with her family. She is married and has one child. Her first startup business failed because it was not active during six monthes. Then she and her husband together wanted to do business in a domestic market. She wants to buy and sell clothing and attract permanent customers for her goods. She is gentle and communicable with clients. Doing business is not easy in her area because a lot of competitors are doing the business that she plans. She is planning to buy clothing for the upcoming season to start and sell. She appealed to Kiva, asking for a loan to buy clothing to sell for the new season. She is willing to be supported and awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to buy additional clothing for the upcoming season to sell.

loans.name: Sr.de Huanca De Molinito Ii Group

texts.es:
La socia Carolina pertenece al banco comunal SR.HUANCA DE MOLINITO II.
La socia tiene 49 años de edad tiene 02 hijos y es soltera, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias dedicándose a la agricultura y crianza de animales, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de semillas y abono.
Los socios en general se sienten agradecidos por el crédito otorgado y se comprometen a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
La persona que sale con la cara tapada no pertenece al banco comunal.
texts.en:
Carolina is a member of the communal bank SR.HUANCA DE MOLINITO II.

The member is 49 years old has 2 children and is unmarried.  The member alternates her daily activities devoted to agriculture and animal husbandry.

The member has been doing business for a while now and is doing well thanks to the effort she puts into it each day. The member wishes to continue working in this way and be able to continue to support her family.

The member is requesting a loan to purchase seeds and fertilizer.

The members, in general, feel grateful for the loan being granted and are committed to meet the established quotas.

The person whose face is cropped out is not a part of the group.

loans.use: for the purchase of seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Maura Viviani

texts.es:
Maura tiene 44 años de edad de estado civil soltera, vive en casa de material noble junto a sus padres y no tiene carga familiar, en el caserío Buenos Aires del Distrito de Morropon, es un lugar donde sus pobladores se dedican a la agricultura , ganadería y comercio cuenta con servicios básicos como son agua y luz.

La actividad que desarrolla Maura es la costura y confecciona busos, camisas, pantalones y otras prendas, servicio que brinda en su mismo domicilio teniendo máquina de coser propia, actividad que realiza hace más de 5 años, siendo muy conocida en la zona coln buenas referencias, contando con clientela fija. El destino del crédito será invertido en el mantenimiento de su herramienta de trabajo( máquina de coser) y la compra de materiales como telas,hilos, entre otros, esto le permitirá obtener mayores ingresos y por ende tener un mejor modo de vida.
texts.en:
Maura is 44 years old and single; she lives in a well built house with her parents and she does not have dependent relatives.  She lives in the city of Buenos Aires in the Morropon District, which is a place whose inhabitants work in farming, livestock, and commerce.  She has basic utilities such as water and electricity.  

Maura's business is sewing and she makes sweatshirts, shirts, pants, and other garments.  She offers this service in her own home, as she has her own sewing machine, and she has been doing this work for over five years and is very well known in the area with good references and a steady clientele.  The loan will be used to maintain her sewing machine and to purchase materials such as fabrics, threads, among others, which will allow her to make better profits and thereby have a better way of life.

loans.use: to maintain her sewing machine and to purchase materials such as fabrics, threads, among others.

loans.name: N3Thđôngqnham-Loans Change Our Life Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Bốn is 33 years old and is married with three children. She has operated a food stall/restaurant selling fish for eight years. Bốn lives in Quang Xuong district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province. Her income is lower than the national average income; moreover, the market need is low in this region. Her family has no clean water to use.

The main hardship that Bốn faces is lack of capital. She is requesting a loan to purchase more fish to resell for more income.

In 2011, Bốn joined Thanh Hoa microfinance institution to improve her business. Bốn has successfully repaid four loans from Thanh Hoa microfinance institution. She is the group leader of the "N3ThĐôngQNham - Loans Change Our Life" group, which consists of five members.

With her business profit, Bốn hopes for her business to do well, to make enough money to provide for her kids, and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to purchase more fish to resell.

loans.name: Unity Is Strength -N67Minhhợp Group

texts.en:
Mrs Tươi is 40 years old and she is married with 3 children. She has operated a food stall/restaurant selling fish for 8 years. Tươi lives in Hau Loc district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

Her family is a low-income household in the village; moreover this region often suffers natural disasters such as storms because it is near the sea. The main hardship that Tươi faces is lack of capital. She is requesting a loan to purchase seafood to resell.

In 2012, Tươi joined Thanh Hoa microfinance institution to improve her business. Tươi has successfully repaid 6 loans from Thanh Hoa microfinance institution. She is the group leader of the "Unity is Strength -N67MinhHợp Group", which consists of 5 members. With her business profit, Tươi hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and to maintain a successful business.

loans.use: to purchase seafood to resell

loans.name: Repay On Time - N15Vĩnh Điệnthphú Group

texts.en:
Mrs Duyên is 29 years old and she is married, with two children. She has worked in agriculture, raising poultry for five years. 

Duyên lives in Thieu Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province. Her family is a low-income household in the village. In addition, the market need is low in this region. The main hardship that Duyên faces is a lack of capital.  

She is requesting a loan to purchase more baby pigs to raise and sell in the future.

This is Duyên's first loan with Thanh Hoa Microfinance Institution. She is the group leader of the 'Repay On Time - N15Vĩnh ĐiệnThPhú Group', which consists of three members.

With her business profit, Duyên hopes for her business to do well, to make enough money to provide for her children, and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to purchase more baby pigs to raise and sell in the future.

loans.name: Rosalita

texts.en:
Rosalita works hard to support her family. Rosalita is widow and has a buy and sell used clothing business in the Philippines.

She requested a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more bundles of used clothing to sell.

Rosalita has been in this business for ten years now.

In the future, Rosalita would like to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more bundles of used clothing to sell

loans.name: Noe De Jesus

texts.es:
Noé, de 55 años de edad, es jornalero, estudió hasta primer grado, sus padres no lo enviaron a la escuela, porque le quedaba muy lejos, está casado y tienen tres hijos, sus primeras dos hijas estudiaron hasta bachillerato y el último asiste a quinto grado, su esposa es ama de casa y el grado académico de ella es hasta sexto grado.

Noé, actualmente se dedica a la ganadería, le gusta mucho este trabajo, además es examinador de ganado, tiene dieciséis años de conocer y trabajar en la ganadería, también se dedica a la agricultura, el terreno donde tiene sus cultivos está a un kilómetro aproximadamente de su vivienda.

Noé, necesita el préstamo para comprar 2 novillos de repasto, con la intención de engordarlos y cuando estén grandes venderlos a buen precio, para cancelar el préstamo y cubrir algunas necesidades en su hogar.

El anhelo más grande para Noé, es tener casa propia, para brindarle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia ya que son de muy bajos recursos económicos.
texts.en:
Noé is 55 years old, and is a day laborer.  He studied through first grade.  His parents didn't send him to school because it was very far.  He is married and has three children.  His two oldest daughters studied through high school and the last son is in fifth grade.  His wife is a homemaker and she studied through sixth grade.  

Noe works with cattle.  He likes this work, and he is an evaluator of cattle.  He has been familiar with and working with cattle for sixteen years.  He also works in agriculture.  The land where he has his crops is about a kilometer from his home.  

Noe needs the loan to purchase two heifers with the plan o fattening them up and then, when they are big, selling them for a good price.  That will cancel out the loan and cover some other costs at home.  Noe's greatest goal is to have his own house.  This will offer a better quality of life to his family as they have very few economic resources.

loans.use: to purchase two heifers.

loans.name: Adan

texts.en:
Adan is a 27-year-old man who has a 10-year-old child. He is single and lives in his parents' house with his son. He works driving a bicycle taxi. He owns two of those. He also manages a private security enterprise.

He is asking for 5,000 MXN (five thousand pesos) to buy some new merchandise (new wheels and patch for them) and buy a new motorcycle to use as a "MotoTaxi".

He got another loan in the past which he paid on time without trouble.

loans.use: to buy new merchandise (new wheels and patch for them) and buy a new motorcycle to use as a "MotoTaxi".

loans.name: Iris Mae

texts.en:
Iris Mae is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a buy and sell plastic wares business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 19000 through NWTF to purchase additional plastic wares to sell like glass, plates, container boxes etc

Iris Mae has been in this business for 7 years. Iris Mae earns more income from buy and sell ready-to-wear.

She has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase additional plastic wares to sell like glass, plates, container boxes etc

loans.name: Jose Rafael

texts.es:
Rafael, de 46 años de edad, es agricultor, no tiene ningún grado académico, por eso tuvo que aprender un oficio para generar ingresos y sacar adelante a su familia, está casado, su esposa se dedica a los oficios del hogar, tienen 4 hijos, pero solo una es la que vive en casa y es la que le ayuda a su madre con los quehaceres del hogar, los demás están casados, pero viven cerca de su casa.

Rafael, aprendió el oficio de la agricultura desde que estaba muy pequeño, conoce mucho sobre la siembra de maíz, su padre le enseñó a sembrar con la finalidad que fuera un hombre que tuviera ingresos y se defendiera en la vida, ya que por circunstancias de pobreza no le pudieron dar la oportunidad de estudiar, el cultivo lo tiene cerca de su vivienda y sus hijos aunque ya están casados, le ayudan con la mano de obra. 

Rafael, necesita el crédito para comprar abono, semilla y pesticidas para terminar el cultivo que ya tiene sembrado y para sembrar en otro terreno que ha alquilado y que tiene disponible para sembrar.

El sueño anhelado de Rafael, es tener un excelente cultivo para venderlo a buen precio, cancelar a tiempo su préstamo y sacar adelante a su familia.
texts.en:
Rafael, who is 46 years old, is a farmer. He does not hold any academic degree which is why he had to learn a trade in order to generate income and support his family. He is married and his wife takes care of the household chores. They have 4 children, but only one, a girl, lives at home and helps her mother with the chores, the rest are married, but live close to home.

Rafael learned the trade of agriculture at a very young age, he knows a lot about the farming of corn. His father taught him to plant with the goal of making him a man with incomes and able to take care of himself in life because, due to their poverty, Rafael was not given the opportunity to study. His crop is near the home and his children, although they are already married, help him with the labor.

Rafael needs the loan to purchase fertilizer, seed and pesticides to finish the crop which he has planted and to plant in another plot of land which he has rented and has available for plating.

Rafael's biggest dream is to have an excellent crop in order to sell it at a good price, pay back his loan on time and support his family.

loans.use: purchase fertilizer, seed and pesticide to finish the crop which he has planted and to plant in another plot of land which he has rented and has available for planting.

loans.name: Orfilia

texts.es: Orfilia tiene 53 años, vive en una comunidad de Cortes, Honduras, es  una persona   humilde y muy emprendedora ,  se   dedica a su pequeño negocio de venta de  insumos para el hogar desde hace 30 años el cual ha mantenido con mucho esfuerzo ; ella vive con su esposo y con dos de sus hijos.  Su esposo se dedica a la agricultura de café y de esa manera sostiene el hogar. Orfilia solicita financiamiento a Soluz Honduras para la compra de un frezzer solar, ya que con esto  ella  incorporara productos que necesitan ser refrigerados y que actualmente no puede ofrecer a sus clientes porque en la comunidad donde vive no cuenta con el servicio de Energia electrica.    Orfilia está muy contenta porque tendrá algo diferente que ofrecer a sus clientes; lo cual le generara mayores ingresos que le permitirá tener  un mejor nivel de  vida a su familia y ayudara a la comunidad ya que la mayoría de sus clientes caminan largas distancias para poder adquirir estos productos.
texts.en: Orfilia is 53 years old. She lives in a community in Cortes, Honduras. She is a humble and very enterprising person. She has had a small business selling household supplies for 30 years, which she has maintained with a great deal of effort. She lives with her husband and two of her children. Her husband grows coffee and supports the household in that way. Orfilia is asking Soluz Honduras for a loan to buy a solar freezer, since with this she will add products that need to be refrigerated and that she currently cannot offer her customers because in the community where she lives they do not have electrical service. Orfilia is very happy because she will have something different to offer her customers, which will generate better earnings for her that will allow her family to have a better standard of living. It will also help the community since the majority of her customers walk long distances in order to be able to buy these products.

loans.use: to buy a freezer system in order to improve her business' earnings and provide better service to her customers

loans.name: Jorge Alberto

texts.es:
Alberto es un agricultor de 34 años que se dedica a la producción de Café bajo distintos sellos de certificación como ser comercio justo y Rain Rorest , a Alberto le gustaría convertir sus cafetales a producción 100% orgánica, actualmente Alberto ayuda en los gastos de la casa a su madre quien es madre soltera de 4 hijos, Alberto tiene como meta que sus hermanos tengan una mejor calidad de vida y además ahorrar un poco para poder tener un principio económico al momento de formar su propio hogar
Alberto solicita un crédito para certificar sus cafetales como orgánicos lo que le permitirá conseguir mejores mercados para su café por medio de COCAFCAL de la cual es socio, a Alberto le gusta la idea de producir productos orgánicos ya que él tiene un gran amor por el medio ambiente y la naturaleza.
La producción de café orgánico es algo novedoso en la región ya que las condiciones son buenas para la producción y el mercadeo además por medio de COCAFCAL garantiza que los esfuerzos sean bien retribuidos.
Un préstamo ayudaría a Alberto a tener los ingresos necesarios para ahorra y así tener la oportunidad de superarse tanto personal como económicamente.
texts.en:
Alberto is a 34 year old farmer who works at producing coffee under the different certifications such as Free Trade and Rainforest. Alberto would like to convert his coffee crops to 100% organic, At the moment Alberto helps with the expenses of his mother's house who is a single mother of four children. Alberto has the goal for his siblings to have a better quality of living and he also wants to save a bit in order to have an economic base when it is time to form his own family.

Alberto is requesting a loan to certify his coffee crops as organic which would allow him access to better markets for his coffee through COCAFCAL of which he is a member. Alberto likes the idea of producing organic products as he has a great love of the environment and nature.

The production of organic coffee is something of a novelty for the region and conditions are good for production and marketing through COCAFCAL guarantees that his efforts are well paid.

A loan will help Alberto have the income needed to save and therefore have the opportunity to excel both as a person and economically.

loans.use: to buy organic manure, coffee plants from organic sources, pay for labor and other materials needed to convert his coffee plantation to organic.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase jeans, shirts, t-shirts, blouses and other items of clothing to sell

loans.name: La Ñusta Iii Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “LA ÑUSTA III”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Calca, perteneciente a la provincia de Calca y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Antonieta ella es soltera y tiene 41 años y tiene 3 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de venta de cereales, la socia vende maiz, trigo y quinua, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m, la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender los cereales. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar trigo, maíz y quinua.
Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de golosinas, negocio de venta de ropa, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de restaurant.



La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These borrowers belong tho the “LA ÑUSTA III” communal bank. This bank is located in the district of Calca, belonging to the province of Calca and the department of Cuzco.

Antonieta is single and she is 41 years old and has 3 children. She works in her business selling grains. She sells corn, wheat, and quinoa. She works from 8:00 a.m. until 5:00 p.m. She has had this business for several years and it is going well for her. Her dream is to have a locale where she can sell the grains. She is asking for the loan to buy wheat, corn and quinoa. 

The other borrowers have businesses selling snacks, selling clothes, a grocery store and a restaurant. 

She thanks the people who are a part of this dream in this way and committed to making her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy wheat, corn and quinoa.

loans.name: Señor De Huanca De Cusco Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “SEÑOR DE HUANCA DE CUSCO”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Julia ella es casada y tiene 53 años y tiene 4 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de venta de comida, la socia realiza diferentes platos como pollo al horno, sopas y saltados de carne, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 8 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es tener un restaurant. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar productos para cocinar como arroz, verduras y pollo.
La socia que esta pegada a la foto grupal se le tomo la foto despues de la reunion porque pidio permiso por motivos de trabajo.

Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de frazadas, negocio de crianza de animales, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de venta de comida.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These members belong to the communal bank “SEÑOR DE HUANCA DE CUSCO”; This bank is located in the district of Cusco, in the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco.  

The member requesting the loan is Senora Julia.  She is married, is 53 years old and has four children.  She works selling food.  She prepares different meals such as baked chicken, soups and meat dishes.  She works from 8:00 am until 6:00 pm.  She ahs been doing this for eight years and it is going very well.  

Her dream is to have a restaurant. She is asking for the credit to purchase ingredients to cook such as rice, vegetables and chicken.  

The member who is added to the group picture took her picture after the meeting because she was working.  The other members work selling blankets, in a business raising animals, a grocery store business and a business selling food. The member is grateful to those who are part of this dream through this platform and promises to make the payments on the established schedule.

loans.use: to purchase cooking ingredients such as rice, vegetables and chicken.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy more seeds, fertilizers and insecticides

loans.name: Beautiful Life -N22 Minhthọmlộc Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Lan is 39 years old and she is married with four children. She has operated a food stall/restaurant selling fish for six years. Lan lives in Hau Loc district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province. Her family is a low-income household in the village; moreover the market need is low in this region.

The main hardship that Lan faces is lack of capital. She is requesting a loan to purchase fish to resell. In 2013, Lan joined Thanh Hoa microfinance institution to improve her business. Lan has successfully repaid three loans from Thanh Hoa microfinance institution.

She is the group leader of the "Beautiful Life-N22 Minhthọmlộc Group", which consists of four members. With her business profit, Lan hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and for her children to do well in school.

loans.use: to purchase fish to resell

loans.name: Arlene

texts.en:
Arlene works hard to support her family. Arlene is married and has a fishing business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase an additional fishing net.

Arlene has been in this business for 5 years now.

In the future, Arlene would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase an additional fishing net

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to pay small photovoltaic solar electricity systems for their houses.

loans.name: Lucia Esperanza

texts.es:
Lucia, vive con sus tres hijos de 17, 15 y 5 años de edad, los dos mayores estudian educacion básica y el pequeño asiste a parvularia, ella es la única que está pendientede sus hijos, ya que su esposo esta fuera del pais y pocas veces se comunica con ellos.

Lucia, se dedica a administrar su tienda y verificar que sus productos esten en buen estado, aprendio todo eso de su madre.

Lucia, necesita el crédito para surtir su tienda y comprar lo que los clientes buscan más, como verduras, granos básicos y otros productos para el hogar.

Ella desea que su negocio crezca y ser la principal proveedora de su comunidad, tambien desea mejorar la calidad de vida de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Lucia lives with her three children who are 5, 15 and 17 years of age. The two older ones study basic education and the youngest goes to nursery school. She is the only one who is taking care of her children since her husband is abroad and very rarely communicates with them. 

Lucia manages her store and ensures her products are in good condition. She learned all of this from her mother.  

Lucia needs the loan in order to stock her store and purchase what her clients look for most, such as vegetables, basic grains and other household products.

She wants her business to grow and to be the main supplier in her community. She also wants the best quality of life for her children.

loans.use: to stock her store and purchase what her clients look for most, such as vegetables, basic grains and other household products.

loans.name: Lack Of Capital -N1Ngọctĩnh Group

texts.en:
Ms Huyên is 43-years-old and she is a single parent with one child.  She has worked in agriculture raising poultry for more than 10 years.  Huyên lives in Thieu Hoa district, a  rural town in Thanh Hoa province.  Her family is a low-income household in a village, moreover the market need is low in this region. 

The main hardship that Huyên faces is lack of capital.  She is requesting a loan to purchase baby poultry to raise and sell in future.  This is Huyên's first loan with Thanh Hoa microfinance institution.  She is the group leader of the "Lack of capital -N1NgọcTĩnh" , which consists of 5 members.

With her business profit, Huyên hopes for her business to do well, to make enough money to provide for her kids, and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to purchase baby poultry to raise and sell in the future.

loans.name: Lan

texts.en:
Mrs Lan is 43-years-old and she is married.  She has worked in agriculture raising poultry for more than 10 years.  Lan lives in Thieu Hoa district, a  rural town in Thanh Hoa province.  Her family is a low-income household in the village, moreover the market need is low in this region.  

Her family has a latrine, but it is not hygienic.  One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is the latrine is not hygienic. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, brick and equipment to build a toilet.

In 2015, Lan joined Thanh Hoa microfinance institution to improve her business. Lan has successfully repaid 3 loans from Thanh Hoa microfinance institution.  With her business profit, Lan hopes to buy land of her own, to make enough money to provide for her kids, and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, brick and equipment to build a toilet.

loans.name: Mùi

texts.en:
Mrs. Mùi is 49-years-old and she is married.  She has had a retail business selling dry food for more than 10 years.  Mùi lives in Hau Loc district, a semi-urban town in Thanh Hoa province.  Her family is a low-income household in the village, moreover the market need is low in this region. She has no collateral so she can't get loan from other banks or credit institutions.

One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is not having a latrine . She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, brick and equipment to build toilet.  In 2015, Mùi joined Thanh Hoa microfinance institution to improve her  business. Mùi has successfully repaid 3 loans from Thanh Hoa microfinance institution.

With her business profit, Mùi hopes for her business to do well, to travel for vacation within the country, and to maintain a successful business.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, brick and equipment to build a toilet.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for the repair of his tricycle

loans.name: Shirley

texts.en: Shirley is 36 years old, married, has two children of school age and lives in Dipolog City, Zamboanga del Norte. She started selling barbecue once she got married to help her husband in sustaining their family's needs. Shirley is making good sales and gaining enough profit that she is able to save. She learned about the services offered by Paglaum MPC and signed up for membership. Recently, she availed another loan  to purchase raw ingredients for her barbecue business like pork, chicken, spices, condiments and other items. She wants to expand her barbecue business and hopes to have a permanent stall for her business.

loans.use: to purchase raw ingredients for her barbecue business like pork, chicken, spices, condiments and other items.

loans.name: Bưởi

texts.en:
Mrs Bưởi is 42-years-old and she is married.  She has worked in agriculture raising poultry for 4 years.  Bưởi lives in Thieu Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.  Her family is a low-income household in the village, moreover the market need is low in this region. 

One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is the latrine is not hygienic. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, brick and equipment to build toilet.  In 2015, Bưởi joined Thanh Hoa microfinance institution to improve her  business. Bưởi has successfully repaid 3 loans from Thanh Hoa microfinance institution.

With her business profit, Bưởi hopes for her business to do well, to make enough money to provide for her kids, and to maintain a successful business.
