loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, brick and equipment to build a toilet.

loans.name: Segundo Basilio

texts.es:
Segundo tiene 27 años de edad, vive con su cónyuge,sin hijos en casa propia de material rústico en el caserío de Huayapoma, en el distrito de Sallique que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. La vida en este distrito es tranquila, los pobladores se dedican principalmente a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería.

Segundo se dedica a la agricultura y comercio, específicamente de lima, cuenta con una experiencia en el rubro de 05 años y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El préstamo que se le otorgará lo utilizará en la compra de abono y fertilizantes para realizar un adecuado mantenimiento de su cultivo de lima así como para la contratación de mano de obra para la época de cosecha. Con esto Segundo espera ofrecer lima de mejor calidad a sus clientes lo que tendrá un impacto positivo en su nivel de ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Segundo is 27 years old. He lives with his partner, and no children, in his own house made of rustic materials in the village of Huayapoma in the district of Sallique, located in the province of Jaén in the region of Cajamarca in the northern mountain range of Peru. Life in this area is quiet. The inhabitants mostly work in farming, business, and ranching.

Segundo works in farming and business, specifically limes. He has 5 years of experience in it and has very good personal and work references in the area. He will use the loan that will be awarded to him to buy manure and fertilizer to perform appropriate maintenance on his lime crop as well as to hire labor for harvest time. With this, Segundo hopes to offer better-quality limes to his customers, which will have a positive impact on his income level and thus will improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to perform appropriate maintenance on his lime crop as well as to hire labor for harvest time

loans.name: Leonora

texts.en:
Leonora is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with five children, three of whom are in school.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell, like canned goods, eggs, milk, coffee, personal care products, etc..

Leonora industriously earns additional income through other business ventures like pig fattening. She successfully paid back her previous loan, and now she has requested an additional loan to further build her business.

Leonora dreams that one day she will be able to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell, like canned goods, eggs, milk, coffee, personal care products, etc.

loans.name: Ren's Group

texts.en:
A farmer who lives in Steung Treng province, Ren is 28 years old and a mother of three children, only two whom are under the school age. In order to support the family’s living, she is working hard to earn income via cassava growing. Sometimes she works in handicrafts in order to supplement the income. She has been involved in her job for 10 years. 

This is the second time for her with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). The previous loan has helped her to improve her living standards well. 

As the group leader, she is now applying for new loan of 1,600,000KHR, while another member is seeking a loan of 1,400,000KHR. She will use her entire loan to spend on buying a solar light bulb for improving her family’s living conditions. She hopes her family will have a better house to stay in.

loans.use: to buy a solar light bulb for improving her family’s living conditions

loans.name: Rosa Maria

texts.es:
Rosa, de 57 años de edad, es ama de casa, estudió hasta tercer grado de educación básica, es madre soltera, tiene tres hijos mayores de edad, en casa de ella viven dos hijas y dos nietas, de ella dependen cuatro personas, el hijo menor está casado pero vive cerca de su casa.

Rosa, se dedica a la agricultura desde hace veinte años, sus hijos le han apoyado ya que ha sido madre y padre para ellos, no ha sido fácil criar sola a sus hijos, ya que el padre los abandonó cuando estaban muy pequeños, el terreno donde tiene sembrado el cultivo está cerca de la casa, además va a vender pan todas las mañanas para tener ingresos y cubrir algunas necesidades del hogar.

Ella, necesita el préstamo para comprar una motocicleta para que uno de su hijos salga a vender pan en los alrededores de la comunidad y tener más ingresos.

El sueño de Rosa, es tener una panadería propia, para obtener más ganancias y tener una mejor vida.
texts.en:
Rosa is 57 years old, is a homemaker, studied through the third grade and is a single mother.  She has three older sons.  In her home two of her daughters and two granddaughters live with her.  Four people depend on her, her youngest son is married but lives close to her home.  

Rosa has been working in agriculture for twenty years.  Her children have supported her since she has been a mother and a father to them.  It hasn't been easy to raise her children alone.  Their father abandoned them when they were very little.  

The land where she has her crops is close to the house.  She also goes and sells bread every morning to have income and cover some household expenses.  

She needs the loan to purchases a motorcycle so that one of her sons can go sell the bread in the surrounding community and earn more income.  Rosa's dream is to have her own bakery to earn more and have a better life.

loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle so that one of her sons can sell bread around the community.

loans.name: Bernardita

texts.en:
Bernardita is 55 years old with four children all in schooling.

Bernardita operates her sari-sari store (grocery store) business in order to help her husband generate an income to provide for their daily needs and the schooling of her children. Bernardita works hard as she opens her store by 6:00 a.m. up to 8:00 p.m., still taking care of her children and their home.

Bernardita's store is located in front of the street and has regular customers. Most of the challenge she faces is the lack of capital to supply the demand of her customers.

Bernardita is requesting a loan amounting PhP 18,000 to buy two boxes of noodles, five boxes of canned goods, three boxes of snack foods, coffee, sugar and other additional items to sell in her store. The loan will enable her to increase her stock and increase her income.

Bernardita hopes to become a wholesale sari-sari store (grocery store) and provide a much better life and education for her children.

loans.use: to buy two boxes of noodles, five boxes of canned goods, three boxes of snack foods, coffee, sugar and other additional items to sell in her store

loans.name: Evelin Veronica

texts.es: Evelin de 31 años de edad habita en casa de su propiedad a lado de su compañero de vida y sus dos hijos de 10 y 5 años de edad quienes se encuentran estudiando. Evelin es una mujer luchadora que se dedica a la siembra de hortalizas como: mora, güisquil  y ejotes su casa de habitación  los cuales luego de su cosecha los vende a un buen precio con sus vecinos y con los clientes del mercado central de su municipio lo cual las ganancias de sus ventas  le permite junto a los ingresos de su compañero de vida solventar los gastos del hogar. Evelin con el propósito de mejorar la producción de su cultivo a tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para poder invertir en la compra de una mayor cantidad de insumos para sus cultivos como son: semillas mejoradas, abonos, venenos para plagas y fertilizantes para de esta manera al mismo tiempo incrementar sus ventas y obtener mayores ingresos económicos.
texts.en: Evelin, 31 years old, lives in her own house with her life partner and their two children, ages 10 and 5, who are students. Evelin is a determined woman who works growing crops such as black nightshade, chayote, and green beans at her house which she then harvests and sells at a good price to her neighbors and to the customers in the central market of her municipality. The earnings from her sales allow her, with the income of her life partner, to cover the household expenses. Evelin, with the goal of improving the crops' production, has decided to ask FUSAI for a loan to invest in the purchase of a larger quantity of supplies for her crops such as improved seeds, manure, pesticides and fertilizers so that she can increase her sales and get more income.

loans.use: to purchase improved seeds, manure, pesticides and fertilizers for her crops.

loans.name: Nguyên

texts.en:
Mr. Nguyên is 33-years-old and he is married.  He has worked in agriculture raising poultry for 4 years.  Nguyên lives in Thieu Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.  His family is a low-income household in the village, moreover the market need is low in this region. 

One of the most critical difficulties that concerns him is the latrine is not hygienic. He is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, brick and equipment to build toilet.  In 2015, Nguyên joined Thanh Hoa microfinance institution to improve his business. Nguyên has successfully repaid 3 loans from Thanh Hoa microfinance institution.

With his business profit, Nguyên hopes for his business to do well, to make enough money to provide for his kids, and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for his business.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, brick and equipment to build a toilet.

loans.name: Esmeralda Marisabel

texts.es:
Esmeralda, de 40 años de edad, es licenciada en laboratorio clínico, sus estudios superiores los finalizo gracias al apoyo de sus padres; está casada, su esposo se dedica a atender un cafetín, donde vende comida rápida, tienen dos hijos de 17 y 7 años de edad, ambos viven en la casa. 

Esmeralda, tiene su propio laboratorio clínico, donde practica exámenes básicos de sangre, heces y orina, desde hace 7 años, con el tiempo ha ido obteniendo buenos clientes, nunca pensó en ser empleada; es por eso que decidió poner su propio laboratorio.- El laboratorio lo tiene en su casa, por lo que no realiza ningún recorrido, paga a una asistente para que le ayude con el trabajo, el horario de trabajo es de las 8:00 a.m. a 2 p.m.

El préstamo es para comprar equipo para el laboratorio, jeringas, guantes, frascos para toma de exámenes y papelería; el préstamo le permitirá poder continuar prestando sus servicios y tener más equipado su laboratorio.

Los sueños de Esmeralda, son poder tener un laboratorio de referencia, donde pueda atender con exámenes a otros laboratorios.- También, que sus hijos puedan ser profesionales al igual que ella, de lo que gane con su trabajo cancelara la cuota mensual.
texts.en:
Esmeralda, 40 years old, has a clinical laboratory degree. She finished her advanced studies thanks to the support of her parents. She is married. Her husband works at a small cafe, where he sells fast food. They have two children aged 7 and 17. Both live at home.

For 7 years, Esmeralda has had her own clinical laboratory where she performs basic blood, fecal, and urine testing. With the passage of time she has obtained new clients. She never thought of being an employee; this is why she decided to open her own laboratory. She has the laboratory in her house, so she doesn't have to travel at all. She pays an assistant to help her with the work. The work schedule is 8:00 a.m. to 2:00 p.m.

The loan is to buy equipment for the laboratory, syringes, gloves, test bottles, and stationery. The loan will allow her to be able to continue providing her services and to have a better-equipped laboratory.

Esmeralda's dreams are to be able to have a reference laboratory, where she could assist other laboratories with testing. Also, that her children become professionals like her. She will make the monthly repayment with what she earns from her work.

loans.use: to buy equipment for the laboratory, syringes, gloves, test bottles, and stationery

loans.name: Mario Antonio

texts.es: Mario tiene 47 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposa y sus cuatro hijos de 22, 20, 18 y 11 años de edad  de los cuales tres se encuentran estudiando. Mario se dedica a la agricultura en el cultivo de hortalizas. Desde hace mucho tiempo cultiva ejotes, espinaca, mora, cilantro, güisquil, etc. los cuales luego de la cosecha los distribuye en los principales mercados de su municipio, de esta forma se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Mario últimamente se ha dado cuenta que sus ventas cada vez mas van en aumento debido a que ha logrado crear un buen número de clientes que solicitan sus productos ya que son frescos y de buena calidad. Por lo anterior es que él desea incrementar su producción pero debido a que no cuenta con la capacidad económica el solicita este crédito a FUSAI para poder comprar los insumos necesarios para el cultivo como son: semillas mejoradas, fertilizantes, abonos, pesticidas, etc. Mario ya anteriormente obtuvo un crédito el cual utilizo para el mejoramiento de su vivienda con el cual pudo construir un cuarto para cocina el cual hoy en día le es de gran utilidad por lo que se encuentra feliz y agradecido por la ayuda brindada.
texts.en: Mario is 47 years old and lives in his own house with his wife and their four children, ages 22, 20, 18 and 11, of whom three are students. Mario works in agriculture growing vegetables. For a long time he has grown green beans, spinach, black nightshade, cilantro, chayote, etc. which, after harvest, he sells in the principal markets of his municipality. In this way, he earns his living and sustains his household. Mario recently has realized that his sales have been increasing due to having managed to get a good number of customers who ask for his products since they are fresh and of good quality. For this reason, he wants to increase his production but, due to not having the economic capacity, he asks FUSAI for a loan to be able to purchase the needed supplies for his crops such as improved seeds, fertilizers, manure, pesticides, etc. Mario previously got a loan which he used to make improvements to his house, with which he was able to build a room for the kitchen which today today it is very useful, so he is happy and grateful for the offered help.

loans.use: to purchase improved seeds, fertilizers, manure, pesticides, etc.

loans.name: Lucia Carolina

texts.es: Lucia tiene 35 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su grupo familiar conformado por sus tres hijos de 14 años, 8 años y 2 años de edad. Lucia se dedica a la agricultura, cultiva principalmente  mora, espinaca y cilantro actividad que realiza durante la mañana y el resto del día presta su servicio en una tienda de productos básicos la cual está ubicada cerca de su lugar de residencia. Por medio del cultivo de hortalizas y su otra actividad es como logra llevar el sustento a su hogar y mantener la economía de la misma. Lucia anteriormente solicito un crédito el cual fue utilizado para  la construcción de un cuarto dormitorio y debido a la buena experiencia ella desea dar mejores condiciones habitacionales a sus hijos por lo que solicita este nuevo crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la construcción de una pared en el área de el corredor  la cual le sirva como muro de contención con motivos de brindar a su familia una mayor seguridad y protección. Con el monto solicitado comprará cemento, arena, ladrillo y hierro.
texts.en: Lucia is 35 years old and lives in her own house with her family, made up of her three children ages 14, 8 and 2. Lucia works in agriculture, she primarily cultivates black nightshade, spinach and cilantro, work that she does in the mornings, and the rest of the day she works at a store which sells basic products and is located near where she lives. Through her crops and her other work, she is able to bring sustenance to the home and support her own economic situation. Lucia previously asked for a loan which was used to build a bedroom and due to her good experience, she wants to make improvements to her children's rooms so she asks for this new loan from FUSAI to invest in building a wall in the outdoor walkway area, which will serve as a retaining wall to offer her family more security and protection. With the requested amount, she will purchase cement, sand, bricks, and metal.

loans.use: to invest in cement, sand, brick and metal.

loans.name: Villa Rayanniyoc Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “VILLA RAYANIYOC”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Taray, perteneciente a la provincia de Calca y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Bernardina, la socia sigue con su  negocio de tienda de abarrotes, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia continua vendiendo diferentes tipos de productos como arroz, azúcar, leche entre otros a sus clientes que le solicitan, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de azúcar, leche entre otros.
 Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de animales, negocio de agricultura, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de venta de verduras.
Los socios en general agradecen el crédito otorgado y se comprometen a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
The members belong to the "Villa Rayaniyoc" communal bank. This bank is located in the district of Taray in the the province of Calca in the department of Cusco.

The member is Bernardina. She continues with her grocery store business. She has had her business for a long time and it is going well for her thanks to the determination she brings to it every day. She continues to sell various types of products like rice, sugar, and milk, among others, to her customers who ask her for them. She wants to be able to continue working so that she can continue supporting her family in this way.

She is asking for the loan to buy sugar and milk, among other items.

The other members sell animals, work in farming, have a grocery store, and sell vegetables.

The members in general are thankful for the loan given and promise to make their payments on the established schedule.

loans.use: to buy sugar and milk, among other items

loans.name: Fisher-Women - N32Minhhợp Group

texts.en:
Mong is 47 years old and is married with 3 children. She has been a fisher-woman for more than 10 years. She is the group leader of the "Fisher-women - N32MinhHợp" group, which consists of 6 members.

Mong lives in Hau Loc district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province. Her family is a low-income household in the village, moreover this region often suffers natural disasters such as storms because it is near the sea.

The main hardship that Mong faces is lack of capital. She is requesting a loan to maintain her boat for fishing. In 2010, Mong joined Thanh Hoa microfinance institution to improve her business. Mong has successfully repaid 6 loans from Thanh Hoa microfinance institution.

With her business profit, Mong hopes for her business to do well, to buy land of her own, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to maintain their boat for fishing.

loans.name: Alicia

texts.en:
Alicia works hard to support her family. Alicia is married and has a food vending business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 30 years now.

She requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional ingredients like sugar, milk, flour, etc.

In the future, Alicia would like to save money to build a stand for her general store.

loans.use: to purchase additional ingredients like sugar, milk, flour, etc

loans.name: Estrilla

texts.en:
Estrilla is a married with six children. Estrilla is 39 years old and five of her children are in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

She has a fish vending business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 25 years. Estrilla requested a PHP 12,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy additional boxes of fish to sell.

In the future, Estrilla would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional boxes of fish to sell

loans.name: Dionesia

texts.en:
Dionesia works hard to support her family. Dionesia is single and has a food vending business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 3 years now.

She requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business.

In the future, Dionesia would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business.

loans.name: Emma Jaqueline

texts.es:
Emma, de 35 años de edad, estudio hasta noveno grado, está casada, su esposo es cocinero, tienen dos hijos, pero solamente uno asiste a la escuela.

Emma, se dedica a realizar las labores del hogar y a cuidar sus hijos, además hace dos años inicio a trabajar en la crianza de pollos de engorde.- También, inicio con su negocio de venta de tortillas y pupusas, de esta forma unen esfuerzos con su esposo, para salir adelante con su familia.

El crédito será invertido para comprar maíz para vender tortillas. 

Emma, sueña con ver a sus hijos como profesionales y graduados de una universidad.
texts.en:
Emma, 35 years old, studied through ninth grade. She is married. Her husband is a cook. They have two children, but only one goes to school.

Emma takes care of the household tasks and cares for her children. Also, two years ago she started to raise broiler chickens. She also started her business selling tortillas and pupusas. In this way she joined forces with her husband in order to move ahead with their family.

The loan will be used to buy corn to sell tortillas.

Emma dreams of seeing her children as professionals and graduates of a university.

loans.use: to buy corn to sell tortillas

loans.name: Yuli Andrea

texts.en:
Yuli is a 23-year-old woman who lives in the municipality of Concordia, where she has her own business of clothes selling, which has given her the support she needs to live in a good way. Her sister introduced her into the business so she can be an entrepreneur and be successful.

She wishes that she can open her own store someday; that´s why she wants to expand her business so it can start to be more recognized and successful. She knows with it she can grow as a professional and as a person. She's asking for a loan so she can buy more jeans, t-shirts, leggings and other products and this way she has more to offer to her clients. 

She dreams someday being able to buy her own house, so her family can live comfortable and protected. You can help Yuli with the loan she needs and let her start changing her life.

loans.use: to buy more jeans, t-shirts, leggings and other products

loans.name: Eder Manuel

texts.en:
Eder is just 25-years-old and lives in a town called Tolú Viejo, a beautiful place in the Colombian Atlantic coast. Two years ago, this man inherited from his family a business that has been with them for many years, but now belongs to Eder, a farm where chickens and other birds are raised.

Eder has found some troubles that complicate his work, the heavy rains and the drought sometimes affect his animals, even so, he always finds a way to come through. He wants to expand his business so he can improve his sales and with that, get increased profits.  That’s the reason why he's asking for a loan, so he can stock up with animals. 

He wants to help his family, and right now, he wishes he could repair their house because it is in bad condition.  He also would like to see his business bigger and successful, and to fulfill these goals needs a little help, help that you can give him and that might impact positively his business and in his life.

loans.use: to stock up with animals

loans.name: Sagrado Corazon De Jesus Group

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal SAGRADO CORAZON DE JESUS.
El socio Chemar tiene 32 años de edad y es soltero, el socio lleva buen tiempo con su negocio de tienda de abarrotes el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, él socio vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azucar, leche entre otros, el socio desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando  a  su familia.
El socio solicito el crédito para la compra de azúcar entre otros.
Los socios en general agradecen el crédito otorgado y se comprometen a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
El socio que sale con la cara tapada no pertenece al banco comunal.
texts.en:
The borrower belongs to the Sagrado Corazon de Jesús communal bank.

The borrower, Chemar, is 32 years old and is single. He has had his grocery store for a good while, which is going well for him due to the dedication he puts each day into his business. The borrower sells basic products such as rice, sugar, milk, and more. The borrower wants to be able to continue working so as to continue supporting his family. 

The borrower asks for the loan to purchase sugar and more.

The borrowers are grateful for the granted loan and promise to make the established payments.

The member whose face is covered is not part of the communal bank.

loans.use: to purchase sugar and more.

loans.name: Virginia Sulma

texts.es: Virginia de 26 años de edad vive en casa de su propiedad a lado de su compañero de vida y de sus dos hijas de 9 años y 10 meses de edad. Ella es una mujer dedicada a su familia por quien día a día lucha para poder sacar adelante, ella se dedica a la elaboración y venta de tortillas en su casa de habitación y además recibe el apoyo de su compañero de vida quien se desempeña como bartender en un lugar cercano a su vivienda, es así como obtienen sus ingresos y juntos logran llevar al hogar el pan de cada día. Virginia con el deseo de mejorar su vivienda y brindar a su familia una mayor protección a tomado la decisión de solicitar un crédito a FUSAI para poder comprar arena, cemento, hierro y lámina para poder de esta forma reparar el área del corredor construyendo unos pilares de cemento  ya que actualmente son de madera y se encuentran en mal estado, al mismo tiempo cambiar el techo el cual se encuentra deteriorado.
texts.en: Virginia, 26 years old, lives in a house that belongs to her with her life partner and her two daughters, aged 9 years and 10 months. She is a woman dedicated to her family, for whom she fights day after day in order to be able to move them forward. She makes and sells tortillas in the house where she lives and also receives the support of her life partner, who works as a bartender at a place close to their house. This is how they obtain their income and together they succeed in bringing home their daily bread. Virginia, with the desire to improve her house and provide her family with better protection, has made the decision to ask FUSAI for a loan in order to be able to buy sand, cement, iron, and sheet metal in order to be able to repair the corridor area by building some cement pillars, since currently they are made of wood and are in poor condition, and at the same time replace the roof, which has deteriorated.

loans.use: to buy sand, cement, iron, and sheet metal in order to be able to repair the corridor area

loans.name: Damaris Maria

texts.en:
Damaris is a 60-year-old married woman with three children. She lives with them in Chinú, a municipality in Sucre, on the Colombian Atlantic coast.  Sixteen years ago she started a food business, where she prepares and sells really good products and is recognized for that where she lives. She decided to take classes so she can be more professional and offer quality food. 

She expects that her business can grow and give her more profits, so that in the future she can expand her locale so it attracts more clients. Her dream has always been to have a big and successful restaurant. To start building that dream she decided to ask for a loan so she can buy an industrial stove and improve her locale so it may be more attractive. 

She wishes to someday be able to pay for an excellent education for her kids, so they’ll be professionals and successful in their own lives. She also wants to leave her business to them, but first she wants it to be recognized. You can help Damaris to accomplish all these dreams with a loan, so do it now and get her closer to her goals.

loans.use: to buy an industrial stove and to improve her food business locale

loans.name: Katherine

texts.en:
Katherine is 24-years-old and lives in Bello, a municipality in the north of Medellín. She’s a really smart girl with a lot of eagerness to succeed.  She has always thought that to be an entrepreneur is an excellent way to be independent and to do great things for her and her family, that’s why, last year, she decided to start selling Amway products.

She expects to get some new clients, something that has been difficult for her business, but she trusts that with hard work she’s going to make it. In this moment she’s asking for a loan so she can buy more beauty products to stock up and have more stuff to offer. She believes that with her job, in the future she can change the way a lot of people think about a woman and an entrepreneur.  She knows this is a challenge, but she’s determined to accomplish that.

She dreams of being able to buy a house for her and her family, so they don’t have to pay for a lease. She hopes one day she can help more women to become independent and to understand how powerful and capable they are. Katherine wants to do everything, but she needs a little help that you can give to her, let her change lives as she’s always dreamed.

loans.use: to buy more beauty products to stock up

loans.name: Lyceth Mayerly

texts.en:
Lyceth Mayerly is just 24 years old and lives in Bello, north of Medellín city. She has had a dream for a long time to start her own business. She admires people who start their own companies and become successful. She wants to follow in their footsteps, so she is starting her own business selling accessories. 

She lacks the money and resources to give her business a good start, which is why she came to Interactuar and Kiva to ask for a little help so that she can begin her successful and promising career. She asked for a loan to buy the accessories she would like to sell, like earrings, bracelets and necklaces. She hopes to get a lot of clients and to do well in her sales, but she knows that she will have to work really hard to succeed.

Her dream is to someday be able to improve her house, because it is not in the best condition. You can give Lyceth Mayerly the loan she needs so that she can have a good start and be successful in what she has decided to do to support her family.

loans.use: to buy accessories to sell, like earrings, bracelets and necklaces

loans.name: Milagro Del Carmen

texts.es:
Milagro, de 37 años de edad, toda su vida se ha dedicado a los oficios domésticos, porque sus padres no le dieron la oportunidad de estudiar; está casada y junto a su esposo procrearon dos hijos de 18 y 12 años de edad.

Milagro, desde hace tres años tiene una tienda y a veces sale a vender verduras para obtener ingresos adicionales para ayuda con los gastos en su hogar.

El crédito lo necesita para comprar más mercadería como verduras y productos de la canasta básica para obtener mejores ingresos. 

Milagro, sueña con sacar adelante a sus hijos para que estudien, también desea tener una tienda más grande y tener cuatro vacas.
texts.en:
Milagro, 37 years old, has taken care of the household tasks her whole live because her parents didn't give her the opportunity to go to school. She is married and with her husband has two children, ages 18 and 12.

Milagro, has had a store for the past three years and sometimes goes out to sell vegetables to get additional income to help with the household expenses.

The loan is needed to purchase more merchandise such as vegetables and basic pantry items to get more income.

Milagro dreams of getting her children ahead so they study, she also wants to have a larger store and have four cows.

loans.use: to purchase more merchandise such as vegetables and basic pantry items to get more income.

loans.name: Nogoye's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe de 29 membres fait partie du banc villageois qui a été  crée le 29 décembre 2009. Il est constitué de femmes du même village très dynamiques qui ont de bonnes relations et qui s'activent dans le commerce.
COURA debout à droite de la photo et levant la main gauche est âgée de 40 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de  5 enfants dont une fille et 5  garçons .
Avec le prêt reçu, elle va acheter des légumes qu'elle revend dans les marchés hebdomadaires. Elle achète 6 sacs de choux le sac à 4 000 FCFA et le revend à 7 000 FCFA. Elle achète 5 sacs de carotte à 23 000 FCFA l'un et le cède à 27 000 FCFA. Elle achète un sac  d'aubergines amères  à 25 000 FCFA qu'elle revend à 30 000 FCFA, 2 sacs d'aubergines douces à 9 000 FCFA l'unité et le cède à 12 000 FCFA. Elle achète enfin 5 caisses de tomates à 4 000 FCFA l'une et la revend à 7 000 FCFA.
Les bénéfices obtenus vont lui permettre de participer à la dépense quotidienne et aussi d'épargner.
texts.en:
This group of 29 members is a part of the "banc villageois" (village borrowing group) which was created on December 29, 2009. It is made up of women from the same village. They are very dynamic and get along well, and they work in retailing.

Coura, standing on the right in the photo and raising her left hand, is 40 years old. She is married and the mother of five children, one girl and five boys. With the loan she is going to buy vegetables that she sells at weekly markets. She will buy six sacks of cabbage, at 4,000 F CFA the sack, and resell them for 7,000 F CFA. She will buy five sacks of carrots at 23,000 F CFA per sack and resell them at 27,000 F CFA. She plans to buy a sack of bitter eggplant for 25,000 F CFA (to resell at 30,000 F CFA), two sacks of sweet eggplant at 9,000 F CFA each and resell them at 12,000 F CFA. She will purchase five cases of tomatoes at 4,000 F CFA to resell at 7,000 F CFA.

The profit she will make will allow her to help out with daily expenses and also to put aside as savings.

loans.use: to buy vegetables for resale.

loans.name: Adriana Maria

texts.en:
Adriana Maria is a 38-year-old married woman with two beautiful daughters who are 15 and 6 years old. They all live in Jardin, a really amazing town in Antioquia. The town is famous for the kindness of its people, and Adriana is no exception. For many years, her husband was the only one who gave economic support to the family, so last year Adriana Maria decided to start her own business so that she can help all of them. She sells products from Amway. 

Getting started has been rough because not many people in Jardin know the products she’s selling them. Nevertheless, she has decided to succeed, so she has taken some time to do publicity for the products so people can get to know them better, and that has helped her a lot. She’s asking for a loan to buy more products from Amway to offer to more clients.

She wants to improve her sales in order to get more profits, which is why she desires to expand her business. She also dreams of having the opportunity of giving a good education to her daughters, to maybe buy a house for her entire family in the future, and to leave the business to her children. Adriana Maria just needs a little help that she can get from you; a loan may change her life.

loans.use: to buy more Amway products to sell

loans.name: Catherine

texts.en:
Catherine is just 18 years old and has a beautiful, little daughter that is only three months old. They live with Catherine’s partner in the municipality of Bello. This young, but committed woman has decided to start her own business, as a way to support her little girl and give her a good quality of life. She just inherited a family business where they raise cattle. The problem is that, right now, there aren't enough steers. 

Catherine is determined to make her business grow and be successful because she feels a big responsibility with her family and with herself to make great things with her life. She’s asking for a loan, so she can buy three new steers to make her business bigger. Someday, she expects to be able of offer jobs to more people and see her business last. 

One of her biggest dreams is to pay for her daughter's education, so she can be a professional and a good person for her family and society. This young woman has her whole life in front of her. You can be part of one moment when she’s going to do something great, help her with a loan, and watch her succeed.

loans.use: to buy three new steers.

loans.name: Maria Emelina

texts.es:
María, de 57 años de edad, está casada, tiene tres hijos, de los cuales solo uno vive junto a ella porque los otros dos están acompañados y su esposo se dedica a los trabajos agrícolas.

María, junto a su esposo trabaja desde hace más de 38 años en la agricultura, ya que esa ha sido la actividad productiva de la familia; actualmente trabaja dos hectáreas de maíz, pero también se dedican a la crianza de ganado de repasto.

El dinero del préstamo será invertido para comprar dos bueyes, porque necesitan ganado para arar la tierra y acarrear la cosecha.

El sueño que tiene María, es que su vida sea un poco menos complicada, porque a su edad se le hace difícil realizar trabajos pesados.
texts.en:
María, 57 years old, is married, has three children, of whom only one lives with her because the other are partnered, and her husband works in agriculture. 

María, with her husband, has worked for more than 38 years in agriculture, since this has been the work of the family. Currently she works two hectares of corn, but she also works raising beef cattle. 

The money from the loan will be invested to purchase two oxen because she needs livestock to plow the land and carry the harvest.

María's dream is that her life will be a little less difficult because at her age it is difficult to do heavy work.

loans.use: to purchase two oxen, because she need livestock to plow the land and carry the harvest.

loans.name: Santos Diosis

texts.es:
Santos, de 40 años de edad, es madre de 8 hijos, uno de ellos está estudiando bachillerato y su esposo trabaja como agricultor.

Santos, a la edad de 11 años quedo huérfana, porque sus padres fallecieron y ella tuvo que criarse al lado de sus tías, quienes la obligaban a trabajar para ganarse el pan de cada día; luego se independizo y se acompañó, actualmente trabaja de la mano con su pareja en la agricultura, ellos siembran maíz, frijol, jícama y hortalizas como chile, pepino y tomate; actualmente tienen cultivado 628.86 metros cuadrados de tomate y 628.86 metros cuadrados de chile.

El dinero de este crédito será para comprar insumos agrícolas como fertilizantes e insecticidas ya que sus cultivos de tomate y chile están a punto de dar la cosecha y necesitan protegerlo de las plagas.

El sueño que tiene Santos, es que sus hijos tengan la oportunidad de conocer el trabajo agrícola y que se preparen académicamente para que sean profesionales.
texts.en:
Santos, 40 years old, is the mother of 8 children, one of whom is in secondary school, and her partner works as a farmer.

Santos, at the age of 11, became an orphan because her parents died, and she had to grow up with her aunts, who made her work to earn her daily bread. Later, she became independent and entered a relationship. Currently she works with her partner in agriculture. They plant corn, beans, jicama, and vegetables such as chili, cucumber and tomatoes. Currently they have 628.86 square meters cultivated with tomatoes, and 628.86 square meters of chili.

The money from this loan will be to purchase agricultural supplies such as fertilizers and insecticides since her tomato and chili crops are soon ready for harvest and she needs to protect them from pests.

Santos's dream is that her children will have the opportunity to know agricultural work and to prepare themselves academically to be professionals.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies such as fertilizers and insecticides because her tomato and chili crops are soon ready for harvest and she needs to protect them from pests.

loans.name: Safari Group

texts.en:
Selina, who is in her mid 30s, is a married with five children. She has been running a fruit vendor business for two years now. She works from 10:00 a.m. to 8:00 p.m.daily and is able to make a fair monthly profit. 

This will be Selina's first loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. 

She will use this loan to restock the out-of-stock of fruits; she dreams of expanding business and building her own house.  She will share this loan with her loan group, ‘’Safari", which consists of six members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

She will use the profit to pay school fees and cover household expenses.

loans.use: to restock the out-of-stock fruit

loans.name: Rola

texts.en:
Rola is a 39-year-old married mother of four children. She started working as a hairdresser 17 years ago, to help her husband in covering the needs and expenses of their family. She learned beauty care in an institute, and now she is well-known among her region for her professional skills. 

Rola is trying hard to develop her business, thus today she is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to buy the necessary beauty cosmetics and make up to satisfy her customers' special requests.
Rola hopes to expand her business more in the future to increase her income and improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy beauty cosmetics and make up to satisfy her customers' special requests

loans.name: Segundo Gregorio

texts.es:
Segundo Gregorio tiene 45 años de edad, conviviente, vive con su hijo en su propia casa del Caserío Culpon, una zona rural de Nueva Arica, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

El se dedica a dar servicios de jornalero agrícola, desde hace 8 años su negocio se encuentra ubicado en la parte posterior de su domicilio, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa para la compra de otra mochila para fumigar y otras herramientas para mejorar su servicios, que le permitan ofrecerlo a un mayor precio, generando así mayores ingresos y poder mejorar su calida de vida.
texts.en:
Segundo Gregorio is 45 years old, partnered, and lives with his child in his own house in the village of Culpon, a rural zone in Nueva Arica. It is a community which works in agriculture, commerce, and raising animals, located in Chiclayo province, which is part of Lambayeque region on the northern coast of Peru.

He has worked as an agricultural day laborer for the past 8 years. His business is located behind his home. He asks Edpyme Alternativa for a loan to purchase another backpack sprayer and other tools to improve his services, which will allow him to offer them at a higher price, generating increased income and be able to improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase another backpack sprayer and other tools to improve his services.

loans.name: Mbuni Group

texts.en:
Rehema, who is in her mid 40s, is married with four kids who are still in school. She has been running two projects; she is selling different kinds of drinks in her grocery business. She has been in her business for five years now. She works from 08 am to midnight daily, and is able to make a good monthly profit. 

This will be Rehema’s tenth loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She used the previous loans to buy a stock of drinks for her grocery. 

She is doing great, and has managed to pay back all her loans successfully. She used the profit for household expenses.

She will use this loan to buy missing drinks for her grocery. 

She dreams to improve her business and establish another business. Rehema will share this loan with her loan group, "Mbuni", which has seven members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan

loans.use: to buy missing drinks for her grocery.

loans.name: Maa Tarini Shg-B Group

texts.en:
Baidehi is a 41-year-old, divorced lady. She has two children, one of them is in school. Her family lives in a village in the Keonjhar District in Odisha, India. She and her elder son earn a living through working as farmers and cultivating rice and vegetables. Having been in this business for seven years, she is able to earn approximately 3,000 INR per month to meet her family’s needs. Baidehi is leading a group named Maa Tarini Shg-B (Self-Help Group B). The members of this Group are engaged in different kinds of activities like agriculture, a general store and a dairy farm business.

Baidehi is applying for a loan with Peoples' Forum with her group. Baidehi is going to use her portion to buy fertilizers, seeds, pesticides and some irrigation tools for her farmland. With this loan, she hopes to raise more crops and sell them for a good price to make a better living so as to send her younger son to a good school.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers, seeds, pesticides and some irrigation tools for her farmland.

loans.name: Victoriano

texts.es:
Victoriano, de 55 años de edad, es una persona humilde y trabajadora, que por motivos de escasos recursos económicos no pudo asistir a una escuela, sus padres le enseñaron a trabajar la tierra desde muy temprana edad, tiene 2 hijas de 3 y 13 años de edad que están estudiando.

Victoriano, actualmente es agricultor y también se dedica al comercio de productos artesanales como petates; su compañera de vida es una comerciante y se dedica a administrar una pequeña tienda.

Victoriano, siempre a trabajado fuertemente para sacar a su familia adelante y actualmente necesita el crédito para comprar petates, construir un corral y comprar alimento para cerdos, todo esto para tenerlos en un terreno suelto y evitar incomodidades.

Su mayor sueño es apoyar a sus hijas para que estudien, además sueña con tener un negocio grande con la crianza de cerdo y mejorar el negocio de su esposa.
texts.en:
Victoriano, 55 years old, is a humble and hard-working person who, for reasons of limited resources, couldn't go to school. His parents taught him to work the land from a very young age. He has two daughters, ages 3 and 13, of whom one is a student. 

Victoriano is now a farmer and also works selling crafts such as bedrolls. His life partner is a businesswoman and works running a small store.

Victoriano always works very hard to get his family ahead and currently needs the loan to purchase bedrolls, build a corral, and purchase pig feed, all of this to have them in open land and avoid discomfort.

His greatest dream is to support his daughters so they go to school, in addition he dreams of having a large business raising pigs and to improve his partner's business.

loans.use: to purchase bedrolls, build a corral and purchase pig feed.

loans.name: Luis Orlando

texts.en:
Luis Orlando is a 43-year-old married man who has four children. He lives in Puerto Triunfo, a beautiful place with an amazing culture. Luis Orlando has been driving his own truck since 2011. He transports different kinds of products, depending on what his clients ask for. Years ago, Luis had an accident that didn’t let him work for awhile, but he made it through and now he works really hard for his family.

Unfortunately, his truck broke down and he doesn’t possess the money to repair it, so he´s asking for a loan so that he can repair his truck and keep working as always. He is the only economic support that this family has, so he needs to get back to work soon.

He wants to give his family the best quality of life that he can, and he also wishes to improve the condition of his home so that his family can feel protected and comfortable. You can be part of this dream with just one loan. Please help Luis Orlando.

loans.use: to repair his truck

loans.name: Marcos Enrique

texts.en:
Marcos Enrique is 26 years old and has two children. He lives in San Pelayo, a town near the Colombian Atlantic coast. He is an entrepreneur who decided to start his own ice cream business. He wants to make it successful and to be recognized in the entire town, where the heat is really high, so this is the perfect business to start.

He is doing this because he wants to support his children and family, because they are the most important thing he has. To start his business, he came to Interactuar and to Kiva to ask for a loan to buy the ice creams, some plates and plasticware, chairs and tables, so that the service he offers can be a good one.

His dream is to someday see his business become successful, so he is committed to working really hard to accomplish that goal. He hopes to be able to improve his house so that his family can have a better quality of life. You can help Marcos Enrique with a loan and get him closer to achieving his dreams.

loans.use: to buy ice creams, some plates and plasticware, chairs and tables

loans.name: Silvia

texts.es: Silvia de 52 años de edad habita en casa de su propiedad a lado de un sobrino y de su madre quien es de avanzada edad y ya no cuenta con la capacidad de desempeñar una labor para devengar un sueldo y aportar a la casa.  Silvia es una mujer tenaz que a diario se dedica al cultivo de chile jalapeño en su casa de habitación y la cosecha que obtiene luego la distribuye de forma ambulante en los principales mercados de su municipio, gracias a esta actividad y las buenas ganancias que genera por las ventas de su producto es como ella logra solventar los gastos del hogar y sacar así adelante a su familia la cual son lo más importante que posee. Silvia con el deseo de mantener su negocio a flote e incrementar su producción de chiles ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSIA para poder invertir en los insumos necesarios para su cultivo como son: abonos, fertilizantes y venenos para plagas.
texts.en:
Silvia is 52 years old and lives in a home on her own property, next to her nephew and her mother who is elderly and can no longer work for an income.  Silvia is a tenacious woman who works daily growing jalapeños in her home. She distributes her harvest throughout the markets in her town. Thanks to this job and her earnings from selling her produce, she is able to provide for her household and get ahead with her family who are the most important things in her life.

Silvia hopes to keep her business afloat and increase her pepper production, which is why she has decided to seek a loan from FUSAI to purchase the needed supplies for her crops such as: manure, fertilizers and pesticides.

loans.use: purchase manure, fertilizers and pesticides.

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.en:
Luz Marina is 63 years old and lives in Las Córdobas. She has two children who help her with her business, which is a farm where she raises chickens and gathers their eggs to sell to her clients. She does this because she loves to work with animals and in nature. 

Now she wants to expand her business and invest in it. She is asking for a loan to buy some pigs to raise, so that she can diversify her work and have more to offer. She wants to increase her sales to be able to provide for her family, and she is committed to doing that and more, just to see them happy.

Her dream is to improve her home, which isn’t in the best condition right now. She also wants to see her business endure and grow. Luz Marina just needs a little help, and you can give it to her through a loan.

loans.use: to buy some pigs to raise

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: purchase agricultural supplies such as, manure, pesticides and herbicides.

loans.name: Alba Helida

texts.en:
Alba is a 42-year-old married woman who lives in the municipality of Bello at the south of Medellín with her husband and daughter. Since 2006, she has run a business with her husband.  Alba and her husband make traditional wooden handicrafts, a job that he taught her. They are most famous for their chivas, a type of bus for people in the countryside, that transport all kinds of things such as people, animals, vegetables, fruit, coffee, and other items. Chivas are a symbol of Colombian culture and represent a lot what the culture is. As Alba’s business is the only business that makes chivas in their location, the demand is pretty high.

Alba is requesting a loan to buy some work materials and to remodel her business locale. She sees in Interactuar and Kiva the opportunity to improve her business and increase her sales. Alba has some pretty big dreams too; one of them is to pay for her daughter’s education and another one is to be able to buy a new house for her family because they don’t have one right now. You can help Alba with a loan that will get her closer to her dreams.

loans.use: to buy work materials and remodel her business locale

loans.name: Paula

texts.es:
Paula, estudio hasta quinto grado, debido a  que sus padres ya no podían seguirle pagando los estudios porque eran muy pobres y tenían que trabajar en el campo para poder salir adelante; ahora está acompañada y su pareja es agricultor y tienen 4 hijos de 29, 24, 20 y 18 años de edad, pero solo tres viven con ella y asisten a la escuela.

Paula, se dedica a la agricultura y a la ganadería desde hace varios años, antes se dedicaba a la venta de comida típica; la parcela donde trabaja está ubicado en la misma colonia, en el trabajo le ayuda su esposo.

El crédito sera invertido para comprar ganado bovino.

El sueño de Paula, es comprar un pick-up para poder trasladarse con su familia.
texts.en:
Paula has a fifth grade education because her parents could not longer afford to continue paying for her education. She grew up very poor and she had to work in the fields in order to get ahead.  Paula is now married and her husband is a farmer. They have four children, ages 29, 24, 20, and 18 but only three of them live with her and attend school.  

Paula works in agriculture and raising livestock, which she has done for man-years. Previously, she worked selling traditional meals from the region.  The plot of land that she works on is located in her village and her husband helps her with the work.

The loan will be used to purchase cattle. Paula's dream is to purchase a pick-up truck in order to transport her family.

loans.use: purchase cattle.

loans.name: Oanh

texts.en:
Oanh lives in Thieu Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province. For the past four years, she has raised poultry. Oanh’s family lives in a low-income household in a village where market need is low. Oanh joined Thanh Hoa microfinance institution to improve her poultry business and she has successfully repaid more than 10 loans. One of Oanh’s most critical difficulties is that her latrine is not hygienic. 

Oanh is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, brick, and equipment to build a toilet. With the profit from her poultry business, she hopes for her business to do well, to make enough money to provide for her kids, and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, brick, and equipment to build a toilet

loans.name: Thankyou, Lenders -N2Minhthọmlộc Group

texts.en:
Mrs Nải is 49 years old and she is married, with three children. She has had a retail business, selling plastic goods for five years.

Nải lives in Hau Loc district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province. Her family is a low-income household in a village. In addition, the market need is low in this region. 

The main hardship that Nải faces is a lack of capital.  She is requesting a loan to purchase plastic goods to sell.

In 2014, Nải joined Thanh Hoa Microfinance Institution to improve her  business. Nải has successfully repaid three loans from Thanh Hoa Microfinance Institution.

She is the group leader of the 'Thankyou, Lenders -N2MinhThọMLộc Group,' which consists of five members. With her business profit, Nải hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and for her children to find good jobs.

loans.use: to buy plastic goods to sell.

loans.name: Nenita

texts.en:
As a married parent of two children, Nenita works hard to support her family. She runs a business buying and selling rice in the Philippines and also earns additional income from running a general store. Nenita has been sustaining her business activities through her past 13 loans from NWTF.

Nenita is requesting a 30,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of rice to sell in her business. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of building and expanding her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase rice to sell in her business

loans.name: Vevencia

texts.en:
Vevencia is 60 years old and married with three children. For the past 22 years, she has run a general store in the Philippines. Vevencia works very hard to provide for her family.

Vevencia is requesting a 15,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy items to sell such as canned goods, personal care products, and other items. She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, personal care products, and other items to sell

loans.name: Arcangel Gabriel Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “ARCANGEL GABRIEL”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Otilia Leonor ella es conviviente y tiene 47 años y tiene 2 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio confecciones como pantalones, faldas, vestidos, pantalones y blusas, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,la socia por medio de este negocio la socia quiere sacar adelante a su familia,la socia ya tiene 40 años en este negocio, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de costurera. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar telas, tijeras e hilos.
Los socios que estan pegados a la foto grupal se les tomo la foto despues de la reunion porque pidieron permiso por motivos de trabajo.
 
Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de librería, negocio de internet, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de restaurant.




La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members belong to the “Archangel Gabriel” community bank, which is located in the district, province and department of Cusco, Peru. 

One of these members is Otilia Leonor, who is 47 years old, married and has two children. She has a business working as a seamstress, making garments such as pants, skirts, dresses, trousers and blouses. She works from 8:00 am to 6:00 pm, and this business allows her to support her family. She has been in the business for 40 years and her dream is to expand her seamstress business. She is requesting this loan to purchase fabric, scissors and thread.

The members whose picture is attached to the group photo, asked to have their picture taken after the meeting, which they could not attend because of work. Other members in the group sell books, provide internet service, and have grocery stores and restaurants.

Otilia Leonor is grateful to those who help her achieve her dream with this loan and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy fabric, scissors and thread.

loans.name: Guadalupe Elizabeth

texts.es:
Guadalupe, de 39 años de edad, estudio hasta cuarto grado, está acompañada, su esposo es agricultor y tienen 5 hijos de los cuales 3 de ellos están estudiando.

Guadalupe, posee mucha experiencia en la siembra de granos básicos y en la crianza de ganado, trabajo que realiza junto con su esposo.- Actualmente, siembra 17,500 metros cuadrados de cultivo de maíz, de esa forma han logrado salir adelante y continuar superándose.

El crédito sera invertido para comprar ganado, para diversificar sus ingresos y no depender solo de la agricultura.

Guadalupe, sueña con mejorar su vivienda y que sus hijos puedan prepararse academicamente.
texts.en:
Guadalupe, age 39, studied until the fourth grade. She is common law married, and her husband is a farmer. They have five children, three of whom are studying. 

Guadalupe has a lot of experience planting basic grains and raising livestock, work that she carries out with her husband. Currently, she is planting 17,500 square meters [4.35 acres] of corn, and this is how she and her husband have been able move forward and continue improving.

The loan will be used to purchase livestock, and to diversify their income and not depend only on farming.

Guadalupe’s dreams are that she may improve her home and that her children prepare themselves academically.

loans.use: to purchase livestock.

loans.name: Raquel

texts.en:
Raquel is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with three children. She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines as well as earning money from selling food. 

Raquel is requesting a 20,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pig and piglets. She dreams that one day she will be able to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy pig feed and vitamins

loans.name: Luisa Nicolosa

texts.en:
Luisa lives in the Mexican countryside and dedicates herself to farming activities. She owns cows, sheep and cultivates a corn field close to her house. In order to complete the household income, her husband works as a day laborer in larger farms during harvesting periods. 

Luisa decided to purchase a biodigester in order to save money by reducing her energy and chemical fertilizer expenses. By inputting her animals' manure in the system, she will become her own supplier of renewable energy (biogas) and nutrient-rich organic fertilizer. Further, cooking with biogas instead of wood will improve her family's health, since they will not inhale the toxic smoke anymore. Treating the manure will avoid the contamination of water sources and the contagion of infections. As Luisa's farm's economy and productivity improve, she plans to acquire more animals to create additional revenue-generating activities. She looks forward to being able to improve her family's nutrition by cultivating vegetables and fruits with organic fertilizer from the biodigester.

This loan represents 27% of the full cost of the biodigester. The remaining part is being covered by a government subsidy.

loans.use: to invest in an 8 m3 Sistema Biobolsa biodigester.

loans.name: Valentina De Jesus

texts.es: Don Valentin de 62 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus dos hijas, ella se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol se dedica a esta actividad desde hace 20 años, vende sus productos con los comerciantes de la zona y con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gatos del hora, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, etc. así como muestra la fotografía para continuar con su trabajo y así tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Valentin, 62 years old, lives in her own home with her two daughters. She works cultivating corn and beans and has done this work for more than 20 years.

She sells her produce with the merchants in the area and manages to cover some of her household costs with the earnings she obtains from her sales. 

She is requesting a loan to buy fertilizers, manure, pesticides, etc., as shown in the picture, to continue with her work and to in that way have better earnings.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, manure, pesticides, etc.

loans.name: Ana Yolanda

texts.es: Doña Ana de 57 años de edad vive en casa propia con su hija y su nieto, ella se dedica a la venta de productos de uso personal desde hace 12 años su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia, posee muchos clientes y con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de perfumes, desodorantes, shampoo, lociones, etc. por mayor y así poder tener mejores ingresos económicos.
texts.en:
Doña Ana, age 57, lives in her own house with her daughter and grandson.

She has been selling personal-use products for twelve years. Her business is located in her place of residence, and she has many customers. With the earnings that she obtains from her sales, she manages to pay for some of the household expenses.

She is requesting a loan for the purchase of wholesale perfumes, deodorants, shampoos, lotions, etc., so that she can have a better income.

loans.use: to purchase wholesale perfumes, deodorants, shampoo, lotions, etc.

loans.name: Ruth Giuliana

texts.es: Ruth tiene 26 años de edad, esta soltera y estudia la carrera de Enfermería Técnica en un instituto particular muy conocido,  en donde ya va por el V ciclo de la carrera y se siente muy contenta con la profesión que decidió estudiar, para luego poder trabajar en lo que más le apasiona que es cuidar de la salud de las personas. El préstamo lo utilizara para comprar una herramienta de estudio y trabajo (laptop) que necesita para poder desenvolverse de la mejor manera en sus actividades diarias. Ella tiene como plan a futuro lograr culminar con éxito su carrera técnica y especializarse en nutrición para poder formar su propio círculo de la salud, donde realizaría charlas, consultas y atendería a sus pacientes que lo necesiten. Ruth se siente muy agradecida y contenta con las personas de KIVA por el apoyo y la confianza que se le está brindando y pide que eso continúe con muchos jóvenes como ella que lo necesitan para poder cumplir sus sueños.
texts.en:
Ruth is 26 years old, single, and is studying the field of Nursing Technology at a well-known private institution. She is now in her 5th cycle in the program and is very pleased with her chosen field. She looks forward to being able to work at what she is passionate about which is caring for the health of people.

She will use the loan to buy a study and work tool (laptop) that she needs so she can handle her daily activities efficiently. Her future plan is to finish her technical course successfully and specialize in nutrition. She would like to form her own health circle where she will have talks, consultations, and will care for the patients who need her help. 

Ruth is very grateful to Kiva lenders for their support and confidence and asks that they continue to do the same for many young people like her who need their help to fulfill their dreams.

loans.use: to buy a laptop for school and work.

loans.name: Rosa Lidia

texts.es: Rosa de 42 años de edad vive en casa de su propiedad a lado de su esposo y de su hijo de 16 años de edad por quien se esfuerza para sacar adelante en sus estudios. Rosa es una mujer dedicada a su familia y es por ello que con el deseo de superarse cada vez mas desde hace cuatro años se dedica a diario a la elaboración y venta de pupusas, además los días de fin de semana también vende comida con el propósito de mejorar así sus ingresos económicos que son de vital importancia para poder mantener la economía de su hogar, gracias a que sus productos son delicioso y de primera calidad ella ha logrado hacer mucha clientela. Rosa con el deseo de mejorar las ventas de su negocio invirtiendo en la compra de mayor materia prima  y además comprar una nueva plancha de pupusas por que la que posee está dañada ha tomado la decisión de solicitar un crédito a FUSAI el cual le ayude a invertir en: queso, chicharrón. Frijoles, maíz, gas propano, una plancha para pupusas, etc., para la elaboración de sus productos.
texts.en:
Rosa is 42 years old and she lives in a house which she owns. She lives alongside her husband and her 16 year old son for whom she works hard in order for him to succeed in his studies. 

Rosa is dedicated to her family and for this reason she makes a living in the daily production and sale of pupusas which she started 4 years ago and has the desire to improve herself more each time. In addition, on the weekends she also sells food with the purpose of improving her economic income which is of vital importance to be able to support her household economy. She has succeeded in gaining many customers thanks to her products being delicious and of the highest quality. 

Rosa wishes to improve her business' sales by investing in the purchase of more raw materials and also a new pupusa griddle because the one she has is damaged. She has made the decision to request a loan from FUSAI which will help her invest in cheese, pork rinds, beans, corn, propane gas, a pupusa griddle, etc., for the preparation of her products.

loans.use: to buy cheese, pork rinds, beans, corn, propane gas, a griddle for pupusas, etc., for the production of her products.

loans.name: Reyna Isabel

texts.es: Reyna de 29 años de edad vive con su grupo familiar. Ella es una mujer laboriosa que se dedica desde hace mucho tiempo a la venta de diferentes verduras como: zanahoria, chile verde, coliflor, cebolla, lechuga, etc. La venta la realiza en el mercado central y gracias  a sus ingresos por las ventas logra solventar los gastos de su vivienda. Reyna desea construir un cuarto ya que como se observa en la fotografía su vivienda actualmente está hecha de lámina, por lo que desea cambiarla para hacerla un poco más segura para su familia. Es por ello que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para comprar ladrillos, arena, grava, cemento, lámina y pagar mano de obra necesaria para la construcción de un cuarto en su propiedad.
texts.en:
Reyna, 29 years old, lives with her familial group. She is a very hard working woman who has worked for a long time selling different vegetables like: carrot, green chili, cauliflower, onion, lettuce, etc. She sells in the central marketplace and manages to cover her household costs thanks to earnings from her sales. 

Reyna wishes to build a room since, as seen in the picture, her home is currently made of sheet metal. She wishes to change it, to make it more secure for her family. This is why she is requesting a loan from FUSAI to buy bricks sand, gravel, cement, sheet metal and to pay the labor costs necessary for building a room on her property.

loans.use: to invest in: bricks, sand, gravel, cement and to pay the labor costs necessary for building a room.

loans.name: Nuevo Horizonte De Sajiruyoc Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “NUEVO HORIZONTE DE SAJIRUYOC”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Echarate, perteneciente a la provincia de La Convención y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Bertha ella casada y tiene 47 años y tiene 4 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de tienda de abarrotes, la socia vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azucar, leche y galletas, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m, la socia ya tiene 5 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar arroz, azucar, leche y galletas.

Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de animales, negocio de venta de ropa, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de venta de comida.



La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members belong to the communal bank “Nuevo Horizonte de Sajiruyoc”. This bank is located in the Echarate district, belonging to the La Convención province and the department of Cusco.

The member Bertha is married, 47 years old and has 4 children. The member works at her grocery store business. The member sells basic necessities like rice, sugar, milk and cookies. The member works from 8:00 am until 7:00 pm. She has been in this business for more than 5 years and it is going very well for her. The member’s dream is to expand the grocery store business. The member requests this loan to buy rice, sugar, milk and cookies. 

The businesses of the other members are grocery stores and selling animals, clothes and food. 

The member thanks those who are part of this dream, through this medium, and promises to make her payments in the prescribed period.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, milk and cookies.

loans.name: Wilber Alexander

texts.es: Wilber de 26 años de edad vive junto a su grupo familiar, el es un joven trabajador que siempre se esmera por salir adelante Y además siempre se preocupa porque en el hogar no le falte nada. Wilber es un hombre que trabaja  como jornalero y además con el propósitos de mejorar sus ingresos económicos se dedica a la pesca artesanal, gracias a sus actividades es como el aporta al hogar y ayuda a mantener la economía de la misma. Wilber con el deseo de mejorar sus condiciones de vida ha tomado la decisión de adquirir un crédito en FUSAI con el cual poder comprar: lamina, clavos, hierro, madera, alambre, etc., para construir un cuarto y así poder ampliar su vivienda y tener un hogar más digno.
texts.en:
Wilber, age 26, lives with his family. He is a hardworking young man who always strives to move forward, and always worries that nothing is wanting at home. Wilber works as a day laborer, and also as a small-scale fisherman in order to improve his income. His work is how he contributes to his home and helps to maintain it financially.

Wanting to improve his living conditions, Wilber has decided to seek a loan with FUSAI. He will use it to purchase metal sheeting, nails, iron, wood, wire, etc., in order to build a room. In this way, he will be able to expand his house and have a more decent home.

loans.use: to purchase metal sheeting, nails, iron, wood, wire, etc., in order to build a room.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers.

loans.name: Virgen Copacabana - Belempata Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “VIRGEN COPACABANA - BELEMPATA”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Ocobamba, perteneciente a la provincia de La Convención y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Luisa ella es casada y tiene 52 años y tiene 3 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de cultivo de frutas,  la socia es una mujer emprendedora y luchadora, la socia tiene un terreno donde cultiva platanos, cafe, mandarinas y naranjas, la socia trabaja desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 4:00 p.m,la socia por medio de este pequeño negocio quiere sacar adelante a sus hijos , la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar su terreno de cultivo. La socia solicita le crédito para comprar semillas y fertilizantes.

Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de animales, negocio de agricultura, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de venta de comida.



La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members are part of the communal bank “Virgen Copacabana – Belempata.” This bank is located in the district of Ocobamba, pertaining to the province of La Convención, in the department of Cusco.

Luisa is 52 years old, is married, and has three children. She works in her business of growing fruit. She is an entrepreneurial woman and a fighter. She has land where she grows plantains, coffee, mandarin oranges, and oranges. She works from 6:00 a.m. until 4:00 p.m. Through this small business, she wants to bring her children forward. She has had this business for a number of years and it is going well. Her dream is to expand her farmland. She is asking for a loan to buy seeds and fertilizers.

The other members work in the animal sales business, in the agriculture business, in a grocery store and in food sales. The member is thankful for all who have been a part of this dream through these means. She is committed to paying her quotas in the established repayment schedule.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to stock up with a sack of cassava flour and charcoal

loans.name: Marilou

texts.en:
As a married parent of two children, Marilou works hard to support her family.

She has a restaurant business in the Philippines and also earns additional income from buy-and-sell charcoal and a general store.  Marilou is borrowing 10,500 PHP through NWTF to purchase additional ingredients like meat, fish, canned goods, etc for her restaurant business.

Marilou has been sustaining her business activities through her past 3 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional ingredients like meat, fish, canned goods, etc.

loans.name: Ndiakhath's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe de 27 membres fait partie du banc villageois qui a été crée le 22 décembre 2009. Il regroupe des femmes du même village qui ont de bonnes relations et qui s'activent principalement dans l'embouche et l'agriculture.
NDIAGUE  debout à droite de la photo et levant la main gauche est âgée de 19 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 3 garçons .
Avec le prêt reçu, elle envisage de faire de l'embouche en achetant un mouton. Elle l’achète à 25 000 FCFA voire 30 000 FCFA et le revend à 60 000 FCFA. Elle achète aussi de l'aliment de bétail avec le reste du prêt ainsi que des produits vétérinaires.
Les bénéfices vont lui permettre d'acheter des draps qu'elle va revendre dans sa localité.
texts.en: This group of 27 members is a part of the banc villageois that was created on December 22, 2009. It groups together women from the same village who have good relationships and who are principally in sheep fattening and farming. NDIAGUE, standing to the right in the photo with her left hand raised, is 19 years old. She is a married mother of three boys. With the loan, she envisions buying and fattening a sheep. She buys it for 25,000 – 30,000 FCFA and resells it for 60,000 FCFA. She also buys livestock feed with the rest of the loan, as well as veterinary products. The profits will allow her to buy sheets which she will resell locally.

loans.use: to buy sheep

loans.name: Jose Rafael

texts.es: José tiene una edad de 34 años, vive junto a su familia la cual está constituida por su esposa y sus dos hijos de 9 y 4 años de edad quienes se dedican a estudiar en una escuela cercana a su comunidad. José es un hombre que día a día lucha para poder obtener los ingresos necesarios que le permitan sostener a su familia y de misma manera solventar los gastos de su hogar. José tiene una tienda de productos básicos de primera necesidad la cual está instalada en su casa de habitación y gracias a su amabilidad, buenos precios y calidad de sus productos a logrado crear un buen número de clientes  que cada día solicitan nuevos y variados productos, es por ello q con el propósito de incrementar su inventario José ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de una mayor cantidad de mercadería que le permita cumplir así con la demanda de productos. Con el monto otorgado el piensa invertir en: sodas, granos básicos, pan, verduras, lácteos, golosinas, etc., y además un estante para colocar sus productos.
texts.en:
José is 34 years old and lives with his family, who is composed of his wife and their two children, aged 9 and 4. The children are students at a school located close to their community. 

José is a man who works very hard every day to generate the income needed to support his family and cover his household expenses. 

José sells essential goods at a grocery store that he set up at his home.
