Muspiroh feels happy because since she joined Ruma, she can get a lot of knowledge about managing a business. As the business grows, Muspiroh is hoping to get a working capital loan from Kiva. She will use the capital to provide more mobile airtime credits to her community.

Your loan will be very useful to help Muspiroh improve her business and accordingly, her community, which needs access to such services. Muspiroh's goal towards Ruma in the near future is to provide an e-commerce business to her community. Muspiroh thanks you for your kind support.

loans.use: to give her community better access to communication services by selling mobile airtime credits.

loans.name: Ma. Chona

texts.en:
Ma. Chona is a hardworking woman from Bien Unido, Bohol. She is married and has three adult children.

She is engaged in multiple businesses such as fishing, buying and selling fish and dried fish, and running a sari-sari store business.

She is asking a loan to buy fishing nets, shrimp and more fish to sell. Ma. Chona would like to let her children continue their schooling through the income that she generates from her businesses. In the future, she plans to make her businesses more sustainable.

loans.use: to buy fishing nets, shrimp and more fish to sell.

loans.name: Michelle

texts.en:
Michelle is from Bien Unido, Bohol. She is married and has three children, ages 3, 6 and 11.

She is engaged in fishing, a livelihood that she learned through her husband, who is a fisherman.

She is asking for a loan to buy fishing nets, fishing weights and nylon, which will help her and her husband increase their catch. Her income will help pay for food and school fees and will expand her business.

Like most parents, she hopes for her children to have a better life in the future, through education.

loans.use: to buy fishing nets, nylon and fishing weights.

loans.name: Usman

texts.en:
Good day, lenders!  Now it’s time for you to meet one of Ruma agents, Usman. 

Usman lives in Jakarta, the capital city of Indonesia. He is happily married and together with his wife, has two cute children. He sells stationey and mobile airtime credits to his community. He decided to join Ruma to try another business opportunity, as well as contribute more to his community. Usman is happy he joined Ruma because he can get a lot of knowledge about how to manage a business. 

As the business grows, Usman is hoping to get a working capital loan from Kiva. He will use the capital to provide more mobile airtime credits to his community. Your loan will be very useful to help Usman improve his business and serve his community which needs access to such services.

Usman's goal in the near future is to provide e-commerce business to his community with Ruma's latest product, "Mapan," so his community can have better products with lower prices. 

Usman thanks you for your kind support.

loans.use: to process more prepaid mobile airtime purchases for his community.

loans.name: Eliasaph

texts.en:
Abias is 52 years old and married, with five children, ages 24, 22, 20, 18 and 16 years. 

He trades in fuel as his major source of income. He has applied for a loan of UGX 3,500,000 to buy more fuel to meet his customers' needs.  

He started his business in 1996 with high hopes of earning income to meet his family needs. He is often challenged by high prices and limited income to maintain a continuous supply. He also farms to supplement his monthly income. 

His business is located outside his residence on a busy street in Bugongi, Shema District, and his customers are all categories of people. 

He is an honest man who works 11 hours a day and 6 days a week. He is faced with a challenge of competition, but has leaned to manage it. 

He hopes to become financially stable and expand his business and in the long run educate all his children for a better future.

loans.use: To buy fuel

loans.name: Wilson

texts.en:
Wilson is 52 years old and married, with seven children, ages 23, 21, 19, 17, 15, 13 and 10 years. 

He is enterprising man who rears goats and sheep as his major source of income. He has applied for a loan of UGX 5,000,000 to buy more goats and sheep for trading.  

He started his business in 2002 with high hopes of earning income to meet his family needs. He also sells timber to earn income to supplement his monthly income. 

His business is located where he lives in Rugarama  Bushenyi, and his customers are all categories of people. He is a hardworking man who works 10 hours a day. He faces a challenge of competition and high prices, but is determined to grow his business through his hard work. 

He hopes to become financially stable and own a large business.

loans.use: To boost his goat trade business

loans.name: Durazno 1 Group

texts.en:
Ana is the leader of the Durazno Group 1. The group includes eight women who will invest their loans in agricultural activities and in manufacturing wicker baskets.

They are from the ethnicity Ixil Maya. On average, each member of the group has three children, and 50% of the group is illiterate. The average amount of their loan is Q 2,225. They are, on average, 38 years old.

Ana is 54 years old. She is from the ethnicity Ixil Maya. She suffered great problems, limitations and risks during the war in Guatemala, which forced her to run away from their village with her family.

Ana is mother of seven children. Two of them died in the mountain during the war due to a very poor diet.

This year, Ana is receiving her fifth credit from Chajulense Association of Women United for Life. She has invested her loan in the manufacture of wicker baskets. Each year her small business grows a little, and fortnightly she delivers two dozen baskets. Through her work and the use of her loan, she gives a better future to her family.

She will use the credit to purchase wicker and manufacture baskets. Her loan is of Q 2,400, she expects to get a monthly income of Q 600.

She considers that the credit is a great opportunity, given the scarce opportunities available to her and the community to improve their lives.

loans.use: to purchase wicker and manufacture baskets

loans.name: Nhóm 19 Cụm Thạch Bắc Xã Quảng Thạch Group

texts.en:
Lương is 28 years old. She is married and has two children. Lương lives in Quang Xuong district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province. Her family is a low-income household in the village. This region often suffers natural disasters such as storms because it is near the sea.

In 2013, Lương joined Thanh Hoa Microfinance Institution to improve her business. Lương has successfully repaid three loans from Thanh Hoa Microfinance Institution. Now she is the group leader of the Nhóm 19 cụm Thạch Bắc xã Quảng Thạch., which consists of five members.

She has operated a food stall/restaurant selling fish for four years. The main hardship that Lương faces is lack of capital. She is requesting a loan to purchase fish to resell.

With her business profit, Lương hopes for her business to do well, to make enough money to provide for her children, and to maintain a successful business.

loans.use: purchase fish to resell.

loans.name: Alberto

texts.es:
Alberto tiene 44 años de edad, vive con su cónyuge y sus 3 hijos en casa propia de material rústico en el distritode Aramango que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Bagua, región Amazonas, en la selva norte de Perú. La vida en este distrito es tranquila, los pobladores se dedican principalmente a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería.

Alberto se dedica a la agricultura, específicamente al cultivo de piña, cuenta con una experiencia en el rubro con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El préstamo que se le otorgará lo utilizará en la compra de abono y fertilizantes para realizar un adecuado mantenimiento de su cultivo de piña así como para la contratación de mano de obra para la época de cosecha. Con esto Alberto espera ofrecer una piña de mejor calidad a sus clientes lo que tendrá un impacto positivo en su nivel de ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Alberto is 44 years old and lives with his wife and their three children. They live in their own house built of rustic materials in the district of Aramango, in the province of Bagua, in the region of Amazonas, in the northern rainforest of Peru. Life in this district is quiet and the local population mostly make a living from agriculture, trade and livestock farming. 

Alberto makes a living from agriculture, specifically by growing pineapples. He has experience in this line of business and has very good personal and professional contacts in the area.

He will use the loan that he receives to buy compost and fertilizers so that he can properly maintain his pineapple crop, and also to contract a workforce for the harvesting season. Thanks to this loan, Alberto hopes to offer higher quality pineapples to his customers which will have a positive impact on his income level and consequently improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to buy compost and fertilizers so that he can properly maintain his pineapple crop

loans.name: Doris Nohemy

texts.es:
La señora Doris de 36 años de edad, vive con su esposo y sus hijos en su casa de habitación ubicada en una aldea de San Lorenzo, Valle al sur de Honduras,  se dedica desde hace 08 años a la venta de cosméticos y lociones.
Doña Doris hace sus pedidos cada semana para repartir a sus clientes vecinos y amigos de la zona, sus clientes la prefieren porque la conocen y saben que es una persona luchadora y  también  porque es muy  amable.
Doña Doris está solicitando el préstamo para la compra de perfumes, lociones, cremas, etc.  Para  ampliar un poco su mercadería y poder satisfacer la demanda de los clientes, uno de sus sueños es que su negocio sea más grande. 

San Lorenzo, Valle -  Julio 2015.
texts.en:
36-year-old Doris lives with her husband and children in a house in the village of San Lorenzo, Valle in the south of Honduras. She has sold cosmetics and lotions for 8 years. She takes her orders weekly and then delivers them to her customers- her neighbours and friends in the area. Her customers prefer to buy from her because they know her and they know that she is a determined person who is also very friendly. Doris is applying for the loan to buy perfume, lotions, creams, etc. so she can have a wider stock and satisfy her customers' requirements. One of her dreams is to be able to expand her business.

San Lorenzo, Valle -  July 2015.

loans.use: to buy perfume, lotions, creams, etc. for her business

loans.name: Durazno 2 Group

texts.en:
Catarina is the leader of Durazno Group 2. The group includes eight women who will invest their loans in agricultural activities and in manufacturing wicker baskets. They are from the ethnicity Ixil Maya. On average, each member of the group has five children and 57% of the group is illiterate. The average amount of their loan is Q 3,485. Their average age is 35.

Catarina is 60 years old, and she is mother of 10 children. She lived through the war between the Guatemala guerrillas and the Guatemalan army. In this period, she ran away from the war, leaving behind her house and her village. Five of her children died during this time.

She is grateful to the people who will finance the group loan. She will invest her credit in buying poultry, pigs and wicker for the manufacturing of baskets.
Her loan is Q 1,200, and she expects to get a monthly income of Q 300.

loans.use: to buy poultry, pigs and wicker

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a griddle to make pupusas in the evening and during the day to sell tortillas.

loans.name: Blanca Elia

texts.es:
Blanca, de 60 años de edad, es una señora con buen carácter y responsabilidad familiar, muy reconocida en su comunidad por la practica de valores morales, no estudio, debido a muchas circunstancias de escasez de recursos económicos y poco interés de superación en su familia; está soltera, porque su pareja migro a Estados Unidos y poco a poco se ha perdido la comunicación.

Blanca, desde hace mucho tiempo ha buscado diferentes alternativas para sacar adelante a su familia, ya que los gastos familiares siempre están presentes; por mucho tiempo se dedicó a la crianza de ganado y producción de lácteos, pero con el pasar de los años, su capacidad de trabajo a bajado, es por eso que ha decidido dedicarse a la crianza de cerdos, para engordarlos y luego venderlos en el mercado, ella dispone de una instalación que está en el patio de su casa; pero además de tener cerdos y aves de corral, en poco tiempo quiere invertir para dedicarse a la producción y venta de estos animales. 

Blanca, ha decidido solicitar un crédito para incrementar su venta de cerdos, ya que ha visto que tiene el potencial de producción y uno de sus hijos tiene conocimientos agropecuarios, que puede servir para guiar todo el proceso productivo.- Con el crédito dispondrá de capital para comprar lechones, concentrado y mejorar la instalación del corral, con esto tendrá que dedicar tiempo y trabajo para engordar los cerdos, pero al finalizar el ciclo, estarán listos para la venta y comprar otros lechones.

Blanca, sueña con ver a sus hijos graduados de la universidad, para que puedan encontrar un buen trabajo a corto plazo; además, quiere incrementar su granja y diversificarla.
texts.en:
Blanca is 60 years old. She is a woman with good character and family responsibility, who is very well-known in her community for her practice of moral values. She did not go to school due to many circumstances of lack of resources and little interest to excel in her family. She is single because her partner migrated to the United States and little by little they lost communication. A long time ago, Blanca looked for different alternatives to provide for her family because there are always family expenses. For a long time she made a living raising cattle and in dairy production, but as timed passed, her ability to work lessened and for that reason she decided to work raising pigs, to fatten them and then sell them in the market. She has a facility on the patio of her house and in addition to having pigs and poultry, soon she wants to invest in the production and sale of those animals. 

Blanca has decided to ask for a loan to increase her pig sales because she has seen that they have the potential of production and one of her sons has agricultural expertise that can serve to guide the production process. With the loan, she will have available money to buy piglets, food and to improve the installation of the pen. With this she will have to dedicate time and work to fatten the pigs, but at the end of the cycle, they will be ready to sell and buy other piglets. Blanca dreams of seeing her children graduate from college so that they can find a good short-term job. She also wants to grow her farm and diversify it.

loans.use: to buy piglets, food and to improve the installation of the pen.

loans.name: Deuany

texts.en:
Deuany is 34 years old, married, and has one child.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a buy and sell ready to wear business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stocks like shirts, shoes, etc. to sell.

Deuany has borrowed and repaid five loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the buy and sell ready to wear business for two years and also earns an income from buying and selling rice.

She aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks like shirts, shoes, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Reina

texts.es:
Reina, de 36 años de edad, estudio hasta primer grado, por motivos económicos no pudo continuar, está casada y su esposo es vigilante en un banco, ella es madre de 5 hijos, el primero estudio hasta bachillerato y actualmente está prestando servicio militar, la segunda hija tiene 17 años de edad y estudia segundo año de bachillerato, el tercero tiene 13 años de edad y estudia noveno grado, el cuarto tiene 13 años de edad y estudia séptimo grado y la quinta tiene tres años de edad.

Reina, se dedica a los oficios del hogar, anteriormente trabajó como empleada doméstica en la ciudad y luego que se casó decidió quedarse a cuidar sus pequeños hijos.- Otra actividad que realiza es la siembra de granos básicos junto a su esposo e hijos. 

Reina, necesita el financiamiento para comprar insumos como fertilizantes, herbicidas y pagar la mano de obra para la siembra de  maíz, maicillo y frijol.- Ahora con este nuevo crédito aumentara el área productiva y generar más ingresos para el sostén de su familia.

Los sueños de Reina, son que sus hijos más pequeños se superen académicamente y que tengan un trabajo digno.-También quiere mejorar su vivienda y lo hará construyendo una habitación más para que sus hijos vivan más cómodos.
texts.en:
Reina, 36 years old, went to school up to the first grade. For economic reasons, she couldn't continue. She is married and her husband is a security guard at a bank. She is the mother of 5 children, the first who studied up through secondary school and currently is completing his military service, the second daughter is 17 years old and in the second year of secondary school, the third is 13 years old and is in ninth grade, the fourth is 13 years old and in seventh grade, and the fifth is three years old. 

Reina takes care of the household tasks. Before, she worked as a domestic employee in the city and when she got married she decided to stay and take care of her young children. Other work she does is growing basic grains with her husband and children.

Reina needs the loan to purchase supplies such as fertilizers, herbicides, and to pay labor costs for planting corn, sorghum, and beans. Now, with this new loan, she will increase the productive area and generate more income to sustain her family.

Reina's dreams are that her children succeed academically and have dignified work. She also wants to improve her house and will do it by building an additional room so that her children live more comfortably.

loans.use: to purchase supplies such as fertilizers, herbicides and pay labor costs to plant corn, sorghum and beans.

loans.name: Durazno 3 Group

texts.en:
María is 45 years old, her mother taught her to knit and her dad taught her to cultivate the land. Her father was a catechist of the Catholic Church and died during the period of armed conflict in Guatemala. He never took sides. When her father died, her mother, María and her five siblings took care of the planting.

María is a teacher, and her two children both are teachers also.

Now she cultivates vegetables, and this year she will receive her second loan from Chajulense Association of Women United for Life. The investment of the loans has allowed her to double the size of her harvest. She expects to get a profit of Q 900 per year. She will invest her loan to purchase seeds, fertilizers and pesticides, and pay for required land work.

María is the leader of Durazno Group 3, a group of seven women who will invest their loans in agricultural and textile activities. They are from the ethnicity Ixil Maya. On average, each member of the group has five children and 43% of the group is illiterate. The average amount of their loan is Q 3,429. They are on average 38 years old.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizers and pesticides, and pay for required land work.

loans.name: Anawen

texts.en:
Anawen is 47 years old, married, and has two children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines. She has been running the general store for 30 years and also earns an income from pig fattening.

Anawen requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stocks to sell like cooking oil, spices, salt, etc.

Anawen has borrowed and repaid 15 loans from NWTF before this loan.

She aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks to sell like cooking oil, spices, salt, etc

loans.name: Noe Alexander

texts.es:
Noé, de 31 años de edad, es un hombre con mucha vocación de servicio y espíritu de trabajo para buscar la superación, estudio hasta sexto grado, aunque sus deseos por el estudio eran altos, las condiciones familiares económicamente no eran las mejores, está acompañado, su esposa se dedica a trabajos de enfermería y oficios domésticos.- Hasta el momento no tienen ningún hijo, porque pretenden estar bien preparados, para tener todo lo necesario para que su familia viva en buenas condiciones.

Noé, desde muy pequeño en la producción de granos básicos, sin disponer de otra alternativa que pudiera sostener la familia, hasta el momento no ha dejado de dedicarse a los trabajos agrícolas, es por eso que adquirió gran experiencia y se adaptó a las condiciones ambientales que cada año son más criticas.- Para la producción de sus granos básicos, dispone de un terreno que está a 15 minutos de su casa.

Noé, necesita el crédito para comprar las semillas, fertilizantes, productos fito-sanitarios, además necesita pagar mano de obra para trabajar.- Con la aprobación del financiamiento, tendrá la disponibilidad del capital de trabajo para trabajar la tierra y obtener el beneficio de las cosechas ayudando a su familia con la alimentación.

Noé, quiere establecer un negocio con especies menores, para aprovechar los restos de las cosecha, ya que las producciones en muchos casos, son bastantes cuando se lo propone, es por eso que desea diversificar sus alternativas de ingresos.
texts.en: 31-year-old Noé is a very service-minded man who is keen to work to get on in life. He had six years of primary education but, although he wanted to study more, his family's financial situation did not allow this. He is a married man and his wife works as a nurse and home help. They have no children yet because they want to be ready and ensure that they have everything they need for a good family life. Noé has grown basic grains since he was very small and this is his only means of supporting his family. He has always worked in agricultural and has, therefore, gained a great deal of experience and has adapted to the environmental situation which becomes worse every year. He grows his basic grains on a plot of land which is 15 minutes away from his home. He needs the loan to buy seeds, fertiliser and plant sanitation products and he also needs to pay labourers. If the funding is approved, he will have working capital to tend his land and reap the benefits of the harvest to help feed his family. Noé would like to set up a business involving small animals to take advantage of the rest of the crops harvested as, in many cases, production is sufficient and so he would like to diversify his income streams.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertiliser, and plant sanitation products for his corn crops.

loans.name: Jose

texts.es: Jose de 34 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañera de vida y sus dos hijos, el se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos (maíz y frijol), tiene 15 años de experiencia en el rubro, vende sus productos agrícolas en los alrededores de la zona donde el reside, el esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controle de plagas, etc. para continuar con su trabajo y así tener mejores ganancias.
texts.en: 34-year-old Jose lives with his wife and two children in their own home. He grows basic grains (corn and beans) and has 15 years' experience. He sells his produce around the area where he lives. he is applying for a loan to buy seeds, fertiliser, manure, pesticide, etc. so he can continue working and boost his income.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertiliser, manure, pesticide, etc.

loans.name: Elvia

texts.es:
La señora Elvia de 26 años de edad es madre de 03 hijos que depende de ella, vive en una comunidad Nacaome valle al sur de Honduras, vive en casa  propia con su esposo  y se dedica desde hace 02  años  a la venta de tortillas y golosinas como tacos, enchiladas, tajaditas, churros,  etc. sus clientes son los amigos y vecinos que llegan a su casa a comprarle sus productos.
Doña Elvia está solicitando el préstamo para la  compra de arena, cemento, arenilla y mano de obra  porque desea repellar su casa para mejorar su calidad de vida y como por dentro esta sin repellar espera poder realizarle esta mejora.
Uno de sus sueños es ver su casa bonita y gracias a la oportunidad que se le esta brindando espera poder lograrlo.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - Julio del 2015
texts.en:
Elvia is 26 years old and the mother of 3 children who are dependent on her. She lives in the Nacaome Valley community in the south of Honduras. She lives in her own home with her husband and for the past 2 years she has made a living selling tortillas and treats such as tacos, enchiladas, fried plantains, churros, etc. Her customers are friends and neighbors that come to her house to buy her products. 

Elvia is asking for the loan to buy sand, cement, fine grain sand and labor because she wants to plaster her house to improve her quality of life and since the inside does not have plaster, she hopes to be able to do this improvement. One of her dreams is to see her house looking nice and thanks to the opportunity that you are giving her, she hopes to be able to achieve it.

loans.use: to buy sand, cement, fine grain sand, and labor for her business.

loans.name: Yessica Patricia

texts.es:
La joven Yessica de 29  años de edad, vive con su esposo y su  hijo que depende de ambos, vive en casa propia y se dedica desde hace 08  años al negocio de venta de hamacas y lasos, vende hamacas de seda, de pita y de hilo, también tiene lasos grandes medianos y pequeños.
la joven Yessica también cuenta con una pequeña pulpería donde vende frescos, jugos, agua, churros, pan, leche, arroz, y azúcar, etc. es una mujer emprendedora con deseos de salir adelante y lucha día con día para mejorar su calidad de vida. 
Esta solicitando el préstamo para compra de materiales como laminas y reglas para  mejorar el techo de su negocio y también piensa comprar varias hamacas para surtirlo. Con el apoyo de este préstamo pretende mejorar sus ingresos y también su calidad de vida, es un cliente  con deseos de seguir trabajando con Prisma.
Su sueño es tener un buen negocio y aumentar su clientela  y al mismo  tiempo mejorar su futuro junto a su familia.

San Lorenzo, Honduras – Junio del  2015.
texts.en:
Yessica is a 29-year-old young woman. She lives with her husband and child who depends on them. She lives in a house which is her own property and for the past 8 years, she has worked at a business selling hammocks and ties, she sells hammocks of silk, pita fiber, and yarn. She also has large, medium, and small ties. 

Yessica also has a small general store where she sells soft drinks, juices, water, churros, bread, milk, rice, and sugar, etc. She is an enterprising woman with desire to get ahead and struggle day by day to improve her quality of life.

She is asking for the loan to purchase materials such as metal sheeting and straight edges to improve the roof on her business and also plans to purchase various hammocks to stock it. With the support of this loan, she plans to improve her income and also her quality of life. She is a client with desire to continue working with Prisma.

Her dream is to have a good business and expand her customer base, and at the same time improve her future along with her family. 
San Lorenzo, Honduras – June 2015.

loans.use: to purchase metal sheeting, straight edges and hammocks for her business.

loans.name: Yeimy Arely

texts.es:
Yeimy, mantiene su negocio con vida gracias a la buena administración del crédito anterior y las nuevas ganancias su familia se mantiene y su situación económica está mejorando poco a poco.
Considerando que cuenta con nuevos clientes y las demandas son mayores solicita un nuevo crédito para comprar camisas, faldas, pantalones, blusas, etc., le será de utilidad para incrementar su inventario y así aumentar las ventas en las próximas festividades de su municipio.
texts.en: Yeimy keeps her business up and running thanks to her previous loan. This new income helps her to support her family and her financial situation is gradually improving. As she has new customers and more orders, she is applying for a new loan to buy shirts, skirts, trousers, blouses, etc. This will allow her to widen her stock and, as a result, boost her sales during the next local festivals.

loans.use: to buy shirts, skirts, trousers, blouses, etc. to increase her stock

loans.name: Katherine Yamileth

texts.es:
Katherine, es una persona que actualmente está acompañada y no tiene hijos, por necesidad de ingresos para cubrir las necesidades de su hogar opto por hacer la apertura de una venta y reparación de celulares, así como también sus accesorios, ella no cuenta con ayuda económica del extranjero.
Requiere de un crédito para surtir la mercadería que ofrece en su negocio, comprara estuches para celulares, protectores, cargadores, etc., con los que cubrirá las demandas de sus clientes, espera atraer nuevos clientes y aumentar sus ventas.
Sus aspiraciones son mejorar su negocio para resarcir su deuda.
texts.en: Katherine is married and does not have children. From the need for money to cover the necessities of her home, she chose to sell and repair cell phones, as well as their accessories. She does not have any foreign economic help. She needs a loan to supply the merchandise that she offers in her business. She will buy cases, protectors, chargers, etc., for cell phones to cover her customer's demands. She hopes to bring in new customers and increase her sales. Her dream is to improve her business to repay her debts.

loans.use: to buy cases, protectors, chargers, etc. for cell phones to cover her customer's demands.

loans.name: Yesenia Mariluz

texts.es:
Yesenia, de 21 años de edad, actualmente estudia primer año en la carrera de mercadeo y ventas en una universidad privada, está soltera, económicamente nadie depende de ella y vive con su madre y una sobrina.

Yesenia, recibe ayuda familiar y antes trabajaba en una alcaldía, pero cuando entro a la universidad renuncio al trabajo que tenía, porque quería superarse.

Yesenia, necesita el crédito para comprar insumos agrícolas como herbicidas, fertilizantes y pagar mano de obra y para arrendar el terreno para sembrar granos básicos como maíz y frijol.- El crédito ayudara a aumentar sus cosechas y obtener mejores ganancias.

El sueño de Yesenia, es terminar su carrera universitaria y seguidamente ejercer la profesión para ser un ente de desarrollo en su comunidad y ayudar económicamente a sus padres y así como también a sus hermanos.
texts.en:
Yesenia, 21 years old, is now studying in her first year for a degree in marketing and sales in a private university. She is single, and no one depends on her economically; she lives with her mother and a niece.

Yesenia gets family help and before worked for the local government, but when she went to university, she resigned from the job she had because she wanted to improve herself. 

Yesenia needs the loan to purchase agricultural supplies such as herbicides, fertilizers and pay labor costs and to pay rent on the land to plant basic grains such as corn and beans. The loan will help to expand her harvest and get more earnings.

Yesenia's dream is to finish her university degree and later work in her profession to be a force in the development of her community and to help her parents economically, and also her siblings.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies such as herbicides, fertilizers and to pay labor costs and to rent the land to plant basic grains such as corn and beans.

loans.name: Jose Antonio

texts.es:
José es propietario de una ferretería, la tiene desde hace cinco años, tiene un empleado, por su profesión tiene experiencia en el conocimiento de los productos que ofrece. Ya ha formado su propia familia, vive con su esposa y un hijo.
Considerando que su negocio debe ofrecer mejor variedad de productos, solicita un crédito para comprar tenazas, bombillos, regletas, destornilladores, etc., de esta manera suplirá las necesidades de sus clientes, espera maximizar sus ganancias para resarcir sus deudas.
Sueña con crecer con su negocio y darle a su familia estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
José is the owner of a hardware store, he has had it for 5 years. He has an employee, and by profession he has experience in knowledge of the products he sells. He has formed his own family and lives with his wife and child.

Considering that his business should offer a better variety of products, he asks for a loan to purchase pliers, light bulbs, multi-connectors, screwdrivers, etc.; in this way he will meet his customers' needs. He plans to maximize his debts to pay off his debts.

He dreams of growing his business and giving his family economic stability.

loans.use: to purchase pliers, light bulbs, multi-connectors, screwdrivers, etc. and in this way will meet his customers' needs.

loans.name: Jose Ursulo

texts.es:
José, se ha decido por un nuevo crédito debido a los buenos beneficios que estos le dan, lo cual es algo que agradece a Padecomsm y a los inversionistas Kiva, lo invertirá en profilácticos y concentrado para alimentar al ganado, así mismo comprara insumos agrícolas para los cultivos de granos básicos, espera que todo marche bien y pueda continuar mejorando su negocio y su estilo de vida.
Con el préstamo anterior fortaleció la ganadería dándole a sus animales mejores cuidados,  ha comercializado mucho más cabezas de ganado generando así nuevos ingresos con los que cancela la deuda y alimenta mejor a su familia, comenta que no ha tenido dificultades para mantenerse trabajando y que todos sus seres queridos se encuentran saludable.
texts.en:
José has decided to take out another loan due to the good benefits that they give him, which is something he is grateful to Padescomsm for and to the Kiva investors. He will invest it in prophylactics and concentrated feed for the cattle, and also will purchase agricultural supplies for his crops of basic grains. He hopes that everything goes well and he will be able to continue improving his business and lifestyle.

With the previous loan, he strengthened his animal raising business, giving his animal better care. He sold many more head of cattle generating new income with which he paid off his debt and fed his family better. He says that he has not had any difficulties in continuing to work and that all his loved ones are healthy.

loans.use: to invest in prophylactics and concentrated feed for the cattle, and also to purchase agricultural supplies for his crops of basic grains.

loans.name: Laura Del Carmen

texts.es: Laura tiene una edad de 32 años, es madre soltera y habita en casa familiar a lado de sus padres y de sus dos hijos de 11 y 9 años de edad quienes son su principal razón de luchar a diario para poder brindarles lo mejor y sacarlos adelante en sus estudios. Laura es una mujer dedicada a su familia y a su trabajo el cual consiste en prestar sus servicios domésticos en casa particular, es así como gracias al pago que recibe por su labor ella logra llevar a diario el pan de cada día. Laura con motivos de mejorar su vivienda está solicitando un crédito a FUSAI para poder invertir en la compra de materiales como: lámina, pines, madera, etc., para poder de esta manera mejorar su cuarto dormitorio el cual se encuentra cubierto en partes por plástico y en épocas de lluvia se le presentan muchos problemas debido a las filtraciones de agua que se le presentan. Ella espera contar con la ayuda e iniciar lo más pronto posible con las mejoras las cuales le garanticen una mejor protección y seguridad para ella y  sus hijos.
texts.en: 32-year-old Laura is a single mother. She lives in the family home with her parents and her two children, aged 11 and 9. It is mainly for their sake that she works hard every day to do her best for them and enable them to have an education. Laura is devoted to her family and her work, which involves doing domestic work for private customers. It is thanks to her wages from this work that she brings home the daily bread. As she wants to make some improvements to her home, Laura is applying to FUSAI for a loan to buy materials such as sheeting, pins, wood, etc. These will be used to refurbish her bedroom which, in places, is covered with plastic which causes problems with water seepage when it rains. She hopes to obtain this help and start the work as soon as possible so she and her children can be better protected and safer.

loans.use: to buy sheeting, pins, wood, etc. to make improvements to her bedroom.

loans.name: Abdulio

texts.es:
Abdulio requiere de un nuevo crédito para comprar insumos agrícolas para que sus cultivos tengan un buen desarrollo y  alimento para el ganado, fortalecerá su negocio y lo mantendrá en mercado.
La ayuda que le dio el crédito anterior le ha dado como resultados animales más sanos y robustos, cosechas más abundantes y mayores ingresos, además comparte un estilo de vida más confortable con su familia.
texts.en:
Abdulio needs another loan to purchase agricultural supplies so that his crops develop sell and feed for his livestock. He will strengthen his business and keep it in the market. 

The help that he got from the previous loan has given as result more healthy and robust animals, more abundant harvests and better income. In addition, he shares a more comfortable lifestyle with his family.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies so his crops develop well and feed for his livestock.

loans.name: Mariela Edith

texts.es: Mariela de 30 años de edad, habita en casa propia a lado de su compañero de vida y sus tres hijos menores de edad. Ella se dedica a la elaboración y venta de pupusas y pan dulce como es la quesadilla en su casa de habitación, y es así como ella se gana la vida y genera los ingresos económicos que le ayudan a mantener la economía de su hogar, además recibe el apoyo de su compañero de vida quien labora en una empresa cercana a su vivienda. Mariela con el motivo de brindar una mayor seguridad y protección a su familia a tomado la decisión mejorar el muro perimetral de su vivienda el cual está hecho de lamina la cual se encuentra  bastante dañada debido al paso del tiempo. Por lo anterior ella solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina y cambiar las que están en mal estado.
texts.en:
Mariela is 30 years old, she lives in her own home, alongside her life partner and their three young children. 

Mariela makes a living preparing and selling pupusas and sweet bread such as quesadilla in her home. In this way she earns money to cover household costs, her partner also works, he has a job in a nearby business. 

In order to offer her family better security and protection, Mariela has decided to rebuild  the external fence for their home. The fence is made from metal sheeting and over time has become considerably damaged. For this reason, Mariela is seeking a loan from FUSAI to invest in buying metal sheeting and replace the parts of the fence that are in disrepair.

loans.use: to buy sheeting and rebuild the external fence of their home.

loans.name: Maria Herminia

texts.es:
María, vive con sus hijos ella es acompañada,  trabaja muy duro para que sus hijos tengan menos carencias, desde hace más de dos años se dedica a elaborar tortillas para vender a sus vecinos, a medida ha pasado el tiempo sus clientes han aumentado y sus ingresos le permiten costear los gastos que surgen en su hogar.
En vista que parte de la materia prima varía mucho en su precio opta por solicitar un crédito para comprar maíz al mayoreo para ahorrar en su costo y tener oportunidad de mejores ganancias, ella está buscando mejorar la atención a sus clientes y disminuir las necesidades de su hogar.
María aspira a tener un negocio más popular educar a sus hijos para que sean personas de bien y que se puedan desenvolver en la sociedad.
texts.en:
María lives with her children. She is partnered and works very hard so that her children lack fewer things. For more than two years she has worked making tortillas to sell to her neighbors. As time has passed, her customers have increased and her income has allowed her to cover the costs that come up in her household.

In light of part of her raw material varying greatly in price, she is choosing to ask for a loan to purchase corn in bulk to save her costs and have the opportunity for more earnings. She is looking to improve her customer service and reduce the needs in her home.

María aspires to have a more popular business, and to teach her children so that they are good people and are able to get along in society.

loans.use: to purchase corn in bulk to save her costs and have the opportunity for better earnings.

loans.name: Magdalena

texts.es:
Magdalena es una mujer con la visión clara que es superarse para el bien de su querida familia, ella tiene 54 años de edad, cuenta con un hijo que ya es mayor de edad, vive en una comunidad de la aldea tzanjuyup. 
Magdalena es de las personas que piensa que las cosas no vienen por si solas si no uno tiene que esforzarse, es por ello que desde hace 6 años ella tomo la iniciativa de realizar un negocio de compra y venta de ropa con el que obtiene sus ingresos y mantiene a su familia, Magdalena a Dios gracias tiene mucha clientela que la buscan muy constantemente y que sus productos ya no se dan abasto, por tal motivo decidió solicitar un crédito que lo invertirá en la compra de más mercadería de ropa típica como: güipiles, cortes y fajas.
El gran anhelo de Magdalena es poder instalar otro negocio de venta de ropa y una tienda de abarrotes para poder mejorar sus ingresos y construir su casa de block.
texts.en:
Magdalena is a woman with a clear vision, which is to improve herself for her beloved family. She is 54 years old, and has a son who is now an adult and lives in a community of the village of Tzanjuyup.

Magdalena is of the kind of people who think that things don't happen by themselves but that one needs to work hard, and for this six years ago she took the initiative to start a business buying and selling clothing, with which she earns her income and supports her family. Magdalena thanks God that she has a lot of customers who seek her out regularly and that her products are running out, so she decided to ask for a loan which she will invest in the purchase of more merchandise of traditional clothing such as tops, skirts and sashes.  

Magdalena's great desire is to be able to establish another business selling clothing and a grocery store to increase her income and build a house of concrete block.

loans.use: to purchase and sell traditional blouses, skirts and sashes.

loans.name: Isaias

texts.es:
Isaías es un hombre de 35 años, es casado con una linda familia de tres hijos de las edades entre 6 y 14 años, ellos viven en una comunidad de Nahualá.
Isaías para sacar adelante a  su familia y darles lo necesario su actividad económica es jornalero, él trabaja en una finca desde hace 10 años, pero también cuenta con una tienda de abarrotes que contribuye con sus ingresos. Isaías solicita un crédito porque tiene la necesidad de realizar un poco más de inversión en su pequeña tienda, compra de productos como; azúcar, sal, aceite, golosinas, dulces entre otro. 
El gran anhelo de Isaías es que su familia se supere y que sus hijos se gradúen para ser grandes profesionales.
texts.en:
Isaías is 35 years old, he is married and has a beautiful family of three children aged between 6 and 14 years old. He lives with his family in the community of Nahualá. 

In order to support his family and provide for them, Isaías works as a farm-hand, he has been working at a farm for the last ten years. However he also runs a small general store that brings in money for the family. 

Isaías is seeking a loan to invest in his store and buy products such as: sugar, salt, oil, candy and snacks. His greatest wish is to see his family safe and well and have his children graduate into worthwhile professions.

loans.use: to buy products such as: sugar, salt, oil, candy and snacks.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in cement, sand and gravel to be able to cement the floor of her house.

loans.name: Elmira

texts.ru: Элмира, 46 лет, вдова, детей нет. У Элмиры среднее образование, уже много лет она занимается животноводством и полеводством. Сумев развить свой бизнес, на сегодняшний день, благодаря ее упорству и целеустремленности, в хозяйстве Элмиры имеется 3 коровы, 15 овец, дополнительно она занимается полеводством, на собственной земле, мерою 3,0 ГА она выращивает картофель и люцерну. За скотом зимой присматривает сама, содержит его в сараях, летом отгоняет на пастбище к брату. Элмира хочет и дальше приумножить ее бизнес, в связи с этим она обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом, в сумме 30,000 сом (KGS), на полученные средства она приобретет скот для откорма. На доходы от кредита Элмира хочет увеличить поголовье скота и на будущий год отремонтировать дом.
texts.en:
Elmira is 46 and a widow with no children. She has a high school education and has been working in animal husbandry and agriculture for many years. She has developed her business to the point where, thanks to her effort and purposefulness, she currently has three cows and 15 sheep as well as 3.0 hectares of her own land where she grows potatoes and alfalfa. In the winter she takes care of the animals on her own, keeping them in sheds, and in the summer she sends them to her brother's to pasture.

Elmira wants to further expand her business, and therefore has approached Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 30,000 KGS to purchase livestock for fattening. She wants to use profits from the loan to further increase her head count of livestock and, in the next year, to renovate her home.

loans.use: to buy additional livestock for fattening and resale

loans.name: Pedro

texts.es:
Pedro es un hombre casado de 60 años, vive junto a su esposa y con sus siete hijos en una comunidad de la aldea Guiniales.
Pedro a pesar de su avanzada edad se esmera día con día para obtener sus ingresos y sacar adelante a su querida familia, él cuenta con  una tienda de compra y venta de abarrotes con el que lleva 15 años, pero para obtener otros ingresos también se dedica a la venta de elotes, maíz y cosecha frutas, con estas actividades ha logrado darle a su familia lo necesario. Pedro su amabilidad, carisma y sinceridad son las cualidades que lo caracteriza en su comunidad, es por ello que su tiendita lo visita mucha gente y él se ha dado cuenta que con los productos que cuenta ya no se da abasto es la razón que lo motiva a adquirir un crédito para la compra de más productos de abarrotes como: arroz, aceite, golosinas, dulces entre otros.
Pedro espera realizar esta inversión para poder contar con una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
Pedro is a married man, 60 years old, and lives with his wife and their seven children in a community in the village of Guiniales. 

Despite his advanced age, Pedro takes great pains each day to get his income and get his beloved family ahead. He has had a store where he buys and sells groceries for over 15 years, but to get additional income he also works selling various types of corn and harvests fruits. With this work, he has managed to give his family what it needs. Pedro's friendliness, charisma and sincerity are the qualities that characterize him in his community. For this, his little store is visited by many people and he has realized that with the products that he has, it is not enough. This is the reason that motivates him to get a loan to purchase more grocery products such as rice, oil, candies and sweets, among others.

Pedro hopes to make this investment to be able to have better economic stability.

loans.use: to purchase products such as rice, oil, candies and sweets.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es: Francisco es un joven que busca superarse, el a pesar de ser muy joven aun, ha logrado salir adelante con mucho esfuerzo, francisco cuenta que con el crédito anterior le fue bastante bien, pues con ello logro comprar sus fertilizantes y realizo el pago de la mano de obra y a Dios gracias obtuvo un muy buena cosecha pero también una buena ganancia, y sus condiciones familiares ha mejorado, Francisco nuevamente tiene la necesidad de un crédito para invertirlo en su negocio de  compra y venta de banano por quintal y ofrecerle a los clientes una variedad de banano y a un buen precio. Francisco tiene el anhelo de construir su casa para que su familia viva mejor.
texts.en: Francisco is a young man who looks to improve himself. Despite still being very young, he has managed to get ahead with a lot of effort. Francisco says that the previous loan went well for him, since with it he managed to purchase his fertilizer and paid for the labor costs and, thanks to God, he got a good harvest and also good earnings, and his family conditions have improved. Francisco again has the need for a loan to invest it in his business buying and selling bananas by the quintal and offering his customers a variety of bananas at a good price. Francisco has the desire to build a house so that his family can live better.

loans.use: to buy and sell bananas in bulk.

loans.name: Nikleby Weider

texts.es:
Nikleby tiene 32 años de edad, es soltero, sino hijos a su cargo, vive en una zona rural del distrito de Oyotún, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, en la costa norte del Perú.

Él se dedica a brindar servicios de jornalería agrícola, contando con herramientas propias, además de dar servicios como albañil, con más de 5 años de experiencia en el negocio, ha solicitado un préstamo para la compra y mantenimiento de sus herramientas que le permitan realizar con mayor rapidez su trabajo así como para realizar reparaciones del lugar donde las guarda, de esta manera el espera tener otros contratos que le generen mayores ingresos para su familia y de esta manera le permitan mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Nikleby is 32 years old, single, without any children in his care. He lives in a rural zone in the district of Oyotún, whose population works in agriculture, trade and raising animals. It is located in Chiclayo province, which belongs to Lambayeque region on the northern coast of Peru.

He works as an agricultural day laborer, having his own tools, in addition to working in construction, with more than 5 years of experience in the business. He has asked for a loan to purchase and maintain his tools which allow him to work more quickly and also to do repairs on the place where he keeps them. In this way, he hopes to have other contracts which will generate more income for his family and in this way allow him to improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase and maintain his tools which allow him to do his work more quickly and also to be able to do repair the place where he keeps them.

loans.name: Grupo La Calera Group

texts.es:
Rosalinda es una madre de 23 años, es soltera con un hijo de tres años, vive en una comunidad 
denominada Chuachinup. Ella (la primera del lado izquierdo de la foto de blusa café) es una mujer 
que se esfuerza para obtener sus ingresos y sacar adelante a su hijo, Rosalinda se dedica a la 
elaboración y venta de tamales, ella eligió esta actividad porque es uno de los negocios más 
rentables y porque este tipo de negocio no es muy común en su comunidad, con esta labor lleva 
ella dos años; gracias al esmero que Rosalinda le dedica a su negocio, ella tiene muchos clientes, 
es por ello que ahora se ve a la necesidad de incrementar un poco más su producto para abastecer 
el gusto de los clientes, por tal motivo solicita un crédito que lo invertirá en la compra de 
ingredientes, hojas de maxan, tomate, maíz, entre otros. Ella espera contar con el crédito para 
poder mejorar sus ingresos y construir su casa de block.
texts.en: Rosalinda is a 23-year-old mother. She is single, has a 3-year-old child, and lives in a community called Chauchinup. She (the first on the left in the photo, with a brown blouse) is a woman who works hard to get her income and get her child ahead. Rosalinda works making and selling tamales. She chose this work because it is one of the most profitable businesses and because this type of work is not very common in her community. She has done this work for two years. Thanks to the pains with which Rosalinda works in her business, she has many customers. For this, she now sees the need to increase her products a bit more to satisfy her customers' tastes. So, she asks for a loan which she will invest in the purchase of ingredients: maxan leaves, tomatoes, corn, and more. She hopes to have this loan to be able to improve her income and build a house of concrete block.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients to make tamales.

loans.name: Grace

texts.en:
Grace is married woman with five children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Grace is 54 years old and has two children who are in school.

She has a food vending business in the Philippines. Grace requested a PHP 27,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy ingredients like vegetables, meat, spices, etc for her food production business.

Grace has been in this business for 10 years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like vegetables, meat, spices, etc  for her food production business

loans.name: Bayarbold

texts.en:
Mr. Bayarbold, 26 years old, lives with his wife in Ulaanbaatar, capital city of Mongolia. He has been transporting people with microbus between districts for two years and his wife helps him as cash collector. The apartment they live in has been deteriorating over the years and it needs urgent repair. 

So he is requesting a loan of 2200000 MNT to buy building materials such as vacuum insulated windows, hardwood floor and fiberglass. After renovation, his family will live in a comfortable and warm place where less coal is burned, releasing less pollutant into air.

loans.use: to renovate his apartment

loans.name: Esther

texts.en:
As a married parent of six children, Esther works hard to support her family.

She has a hollow block-making business in the Philippines, and she also earns additional income from food vending and fish vending. Esther is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF to purchase additional materials like sand, gravel, and cement needed for hollow block-making for her business.

She successfully paid back her previous loan, and now she has requested an additional loan to further build her business.

Esther has been sustaining her business activities through her past 26 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional materials like sand, gravel, and cement needed for hollow block-making.

loans.name: Jona

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children who are in school, Jona works hard to support her family. She has a food vending business in the Philippines; she also earns additional income from buying and selling pigs.

Jona is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF to purchase additional ingredients like meat, cooking oil, spices, etc. for her food vending business.

She successfully paid back her previous loan, and now she has requested an additional loan to further build her business.

Jona has been sustaining her business activities through her past four loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional ingredients like meat, cooking oil, spices, etc

loans.name: Josefa

texts.en:
Josefa works hard to support her family. She is married and has a direct-selling Avon products business in the Philippines.

Josefa requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional Avon products to sell.

She has been in this business for 10 years now. She successfully paid back her previous loan, and now she has requested an additional loan to further build her business.

In the future, Josefa would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional Avon products to sell.

loans.name: Josie

texts.en:
Josie is 33 years old and married, with four children who are in school. She earns a living by farming rice in the Philippines.

Josie is borrowing PHP 14,000 through NWTF to purchase additional supplies for her farm.

She has been farming rice for four years and also earns additional income from pig fattening and farming sugarcane.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional supplies for her farm

loans.name: Louela

texts.en:
Louela is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a pig fattening business in the Philippines.

She is borrowing PHP 9,500 through NWTF to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs for her pig fattening business.

Louela has been in this business for 13 years. She earns more income from a general store.

She has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts, with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

loans.name: Poh Gending Lestari Group

texts.en:
The group made their payment. During the loan periods, they can manage the business well. They maintain sows, and the sows give birth to up to 12 piglets, but not all, they also birth 6 – 8 piglets, depending on the type of sow. The superior sow can give birth to more than the local sow.

Ni Nengah is very happy because her sow gave birth to 11 healthy piglets and she sold all of them. She kept them for two months and sold to the other breeders in her village. All the profit was used as capital for her chilli garden, to support her children's education and fulfill her family's daily needs.

Happy about her success with her sows, Ni Nengah continues her business as a piglet seller. Her piglets are good quality because she tends them well and gives them nutritious feed and vitamins. She also become a example to other breeders, not only in her group but in her village also.

With the same loan size, she plans to use her loan to purchase superior quality feed and renovate the pig pen. Now Ni Nengah and her husband have a chilli garden. With the profit she earns, she plan to plant other crops in her garden, such as eggplant and cassava. She hopes her plan can run smoothly.

Two members were not in attendance at the meeting because of various reasons.

loans.use: to purchase superior quality feed and renovate the pig pen.

loans.name: Claudia Magaly

texts.es: Claudia de 25 años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y su hija quien es  menor de edad. Ella es una joven que se dedica a la venta de ropa en forma ambulante en los mercados de su municipio y en los alrededores de su comunidad, es de esta manera como ella obtiene los ingresos que le permiten apoyar con los gastos del hogar y a mantener la economía del mismo. Claudia está solicitando un crédito ya que desea cambiar el techo de la galera donde tiene instalada la cocina de su vivienda el cual se encuentra en muy malas condiciones, pero debido  a que cuenta con el capital para realizarlo ella solicita un crédito a FUSAI para pode comprar: lámina, clavos y madera para cambiar el techo lo antes posible, y de esta manera mejorar así sus condiciones de vida y las de su familia.
texts.en:
Claudia is 25 and she lives with her life partner and her young daughter. She earns a living selling clothing as a street vendor in the town markets and around her community. This work brings her the income to cover some of the household expenses and support the home finances.

Claudia wants to replace the roof of the shed where she set up the kitchen in her home, which is in very poor condition. She is not able to afford the construction materials, so she is requesting a loan from FUSAI to buy metal sheeting, nails and wood to replace the roof as soon as possible. This will improve the living conditions for her and her family.

loans.use: to buy metal sheeting, nails and wood to replace the roof of the shed where she set up her kitchen.

loans.name: Zamira

texts.ru: Zamira is a challenged woman. She was born in southern part of Tajikistan in 1977. She is living in big city with her family. She is married and has three children. Her husband is an entrepreneur. She is an active, bright and hardworking person. More than ten years as she has practice of sewing traditional woman dresses. She sews at home and has regular customers. Her child is ill and she wants to treat him at medical clinic. She has not enough money to pay medical service. She appealed to IMON asking a loan to treat her child at medical clinic. She awaits KIVA lenders kindness and hopes to be understood.
texts.en:
Zamira is a challenged woman. She was born in southern part of Tajikistan in 1977. She is living in a big city with her family. She is married and has three children. Her husband is an entrepreneur. She is an active, bright and hardworking person. For more than ten years she has been sewing traditional women's clothing. She sews at home and has regular customers. 
Her child is ill and she wants to treat him at a medical clinic. She doesn't have enough money to pay for medical services. She has appealed to IMON asking for a loan to treat her child at a medical clinic. She awaits KIVA lenders kindness and hopes to be understood.

loans.use: to treat her child at a medical clinic

loans.name: Lucia

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Lucia works hard to support her family.

She has a furniture making business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from food vending. Lucia is borrowing 15,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase needed materials like nails, wood, etc. for her furniture making business.

Lucia has been sustaining her business activities through her past 5 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase needed materials like nails, wood, etc.

loans.name: Zarrina

texts.ru: Заррина 38 летняя женщина. Она мать одиночка. Заррина одна воспитывает детей. У нее двое сыновей, они учатся в средней общеобразовательной школе. Заррина работает в библиотеке. Она любит читать и поэтому выбрала именно эту деятельность. Заррина хочет больше узнать и хорошо изучить свою работу, поэтому поступила в институт, чтобы изучить библиотечное дело. Она учится на платной основе и скоро ей надо будет оплатить очередной год обучения. Ее денежные средства не позволяют ей оплатить всю сумму, и она обращается за кредитом.
texts.en: Zarrina is a 38-year old woman. She is a single mother and raises her children by herself. She has two sons, who are students at a secondary school. Zarrina works in a library. She loves to read, and that's why she chose this occupation. Zarrina wants to learn more in depth about her job. For this reason she entered college to study librarianship. She is a fee-paying student, and she will soon have to pay for the next school year. Her money resources are not enough to pay the whole sum, so she is asking for a loan.

loans.use: to pay for one school year

loans.name: Ma. Jurie

texts.en:
Ma. Jurie is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a general store business in the Philippines.

She is borrowing 15,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase more household goods to sell at her general store.

Ma. Jurie has been in this business for 10 years. She also earns additional income from buying and selling rice.

She successfully paid back her previous loan, and has requested this additional loan to further build her business.

Ma. Jurie has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts along with the help of the NWTF loans. In the future, she dreams of saving enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more household goods to sell.

loans.name: Merlita

texts.en:
Merlita is 45 years old and married with five children, two of whom in school, Merlita works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 30000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stocks like biscuits, sardines, milk, etc. to sell.

Merlita has been in this business for 16 years. 

In the future Merlita would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks like biscuits, sardines, milk, etc. to sell

loans.name: Merly

texts.en:
Merly is 45 years old and married with four children, one of whom in school, Merly works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 17000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stocks to sell like noodles, can goods, egg, milk, etc.

Merly has been in this business for 4 years.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks to sell like noodles, can goods, egg, milk, etc

loans.name: Niloveza

texts.en:
Niloveza is a married woman with one child. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Niloveza is 36 years old and has one child who is in school.

Niloveza has a tricycle passenger business in the Philippines. Niloveza requested a PHP 13,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy wheels and other spare parts for her tricycle.

Niloveza has been in this business for eight years. In the future, Niloveza would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy wheels and other spare parts for her tricycle.

loans.name: Nora

texts.en:
Nora is 59 years old and married with four children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Nora has a general store business in the Philippines. Nora requested a PHP 12,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to purchase more stock of groceries to sell.

Nora has been in this business for 35 years. In the future, Nora would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of groceries to sell.

loans.name: Ofelia

texts.en:
Ofelia is 48 years old, married with five children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 16000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stocks like soft drinks, soap, sugar, etc. to sell.

Ofelia has borrowed and paid 26 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 10 years and also earns an income from buy and sell rice.

She aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks like softdrinks, soap, sugar, etc. to sell

loans.name: Mary Joy

texts.en:
Mary Joy works hard to support her family. She is married and has a food vending business in the Philippines.

She requested a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business. Mary Joy has been in this business for 30 years now.

In the future, Mary Joy would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business.

loans.name: Mauricia

texts.en:
Mauricia is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with three children.

She earns a living by buy and sell recycled materials in the Philippines. and is borrowing PHP 16000 through NWTF to purchase additional recycled materials to sell.

She supplements this income with earnings from her general store.

Mauricia dreams that one day she will be able to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional recycled materials to sell

loans.name: Aida

texts.en:
As a married parent of seven children, Aida works hard to support her family.

She has a business making dried fish in the Philippines. She also earns additional income from food vending and fishing. Aida is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to  purchase more fish to make dried fish.

She successfully paid back her previous loan, and now she has requested an additional loan to further build her business.

Aida has been sustaining her business activities through her past 12 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more fish to make dried fish

loans.name: Twuzuzanye Sub Group A

texts.en:
Emertha is a group leader; aged 39 years.She is married with 7 children aged between 5 and 23 years. The group is called TWUZUZANYE means “WORK TOGETHER” in English. They sell different products and they wish to expand their business for changing their better future. 

She owns a shop and has been running a business for 6 years. With the loan, she would like to buy more biscuits, soap and sugar for sale. The profits from the business will be used to improve her standards of living and to buy a piece of land.

loans.use: to buy more banana,sorghum for sale.

loans.name: Haseena

texts.en:
Haseena is 27 years old; she is a married woman.  She deals in business selling animals. She buys animals (baby goats & calves) at low prices, brings them up and then sells them out in the market at higher prices. She makes enough through her business to contribute in the family income. She also sells milk to generate an extra amount of income. 

She needs to improve her business to bear her household expenses. For this reason, she contacted Kashf Foundation and applied a loan of PKR 30000  to purchase more animals to increase her sales. She is very experienced and has good contacts in the market. With this loan, she will definitely expand her business and income level.

loans.use: to purchase more animals to increase her sales

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase cattle for fattening

loans.name: Orlando

texts.en:
Orlando is a 67 years old man, he is a widower and he has 3 adult sons.  Orlando is a retired man, his health is good, so he is taking the chance to pay for some home improvements, so that is why he needs a loan.

Orlando is a very responsible man he wants to leave a good house to his family (all of the members are working but their lives are not easy) so Orlando hopes you can help him to achieve his goal.  His family will be helping him with the supervision and the purchase of the materials.  Orlando is the official owner of the house.

loans.use: to carry out repairs to his house to make it better for his sons

loans.name: Sharbonu

texts.ru:
Шарбону жизнерадостна и приятная женщина. Она мать одиночка и расти детей нелегко. На ее долю выпали тяжелые дни, но она не унывает и продолжает радоваться жизни. Шарбону живет с двумя дочками на маленьком районе под названием Восеъ. Здесь же она работает. Она дома предоставляет услуги швеи. За счет своих услуг она кормит себя и детей.
  Дом Шарбону нуждается в ремонте, стены и потолки находятся в плохом состоянии и жить в таком доме не просто. Шарбону накопила денег, но их не хватает на ремонт и она приняла решение обратиться за заемными деньгами, купить стройматериалы, отремонтировать дом и привести его в порядок.
texts.en:
Sharbonu is a cheerful and pleasant woman. She is a single mother, and it's difficult to raise children. She has had her share of hardships but she is not discouraged and continues to enjoy her life. Sharbonu, together with her two daughters, lives in a small district called Vose'. She also works there. She provides sewing services at home. With this work she can feed her children and herself. 
Sharbonu's house is in need of repairs - the ceiling and the walls are in bad condition, so living in this house is not easy. Sharbonu has savings but it's not enough for the repairs, so she decided to apply for a loan, then buy construction materials, repair and bring her house in order.

loans.use: to buy construction materials and repair the house

loans.name: Presencia

texts.en:
Presencia is 54 years old and widow with five children. She works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 30000 loan through NWTF to buy more items to sell like noodles, chips, bread, sift drinks, etc.

Presencia has been in this business for 10 years.

In the future Presencia would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell like noodles, chips, bread, soft drinks, etc

loans.name: Julie

texts.en:
As a married mother of four children, Julie works hard to support her family.

She has a butcher shop business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from food vending and raising livestock businesses. Julie is borrowing PHP 50,000 through NWTF in order to buy more livestock for her butcher shop business.

Julie has been sustaining her business activities through her past 17 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more livestock for her butcher shop.

loans.name: Pelsie

texts.en:
Pelsie is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with four children.

She runs a rice retailing in the Philippines and requested a PHP 50,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy more stocks of rice to sell.

She industriously earns additional income through other business ventures like farming rice.

Pelsie dreams that one day, She will be able to save enough money to expand her business

loans.use: to buy more stocks of rice to sell.

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is 62 years old, married with six children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Teresita has a food vending business in the Philippines. Teresita requested a PHP 29,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy ingredients for her food vending.

Teresita has been in this business for twelve years. In the future, Teresita would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food vending business.

loans.name: Ma. Fe

texts.en:
As a married mother of four children, Ma. Fe works hard to support her family.

She has a motorcycle passenger business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from rice retailing. Ma. Fe is borrowing PHP 25,000 through NWTF in order to buy wheels and spare parts for her motorcycle passenger business.

Ma. Fe has been sustaining her business activities through her past 1 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to buy wheels and spare parts for her motorcycle passenger.

loans.name: Wilma

texts.en:
Wilma is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with three children.

She has a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 23,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more stocks of groceries to sell.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Wilma dreams that one day, She will be able to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Lolita

texts.en:
Lolita is a married woman with six children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Lolita is 54 years old and has two children who are in school.

Lolita has a fishing business in the Philippines. Lolita requested a PHP 50,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy a new engine for her fishing boat.

Lolita has been in this business for 15 years. In the future, Lolita would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy a new engine for her fishing boat.

loans.name: Jory Ann

texts.en:
Jory Ann is a married woman with two children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Jory Ann is 22 years old, and one child is in school.

Jory Ann has a general store business in the Philippines. Jory Ann requested a PHP 12,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to purchase more stock of groceries to sell.

Jory Ann has been in this business for three years. In the future, Jory Ann would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of groceries to sell.

loans.name: Rowena

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Rowena works hard to support her family.

She has a fishing business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from selling dried fish. Rowena is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF to purchase additional fishing net for her fishing business.

Rowena has been sustaining her business activities through her past four loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional fishing net

loans.name: Rosalie

texts.en:
Rosalie is 38 years old and has three children. She is married, and one of her children is in school.

Rosalie is in the agricultural business of raising pigs in the Philippines. Rosalie requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy medicines and vaccines for her pigs.

Rosalie has been raising pigs for five years now, and has borrowed four times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Rosalie would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy medicines and vaccines for her pigs.

loans.name: Ancheta

texts.en:
Ancheta is a hardworking female entrepreneur with three children.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. She is borrowing PHP 21,000 through NWTF to buy additional sacks of feed for her pigs.

She supplements this income with earnings from her general store.

Ancheta dreams that one day she will be able to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of feed for her pigs

loans.name: Carole

texts.en:
Carole is a married woman with two children, one of whom is in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Carole is 28 years old.

Carole has a business buying and selling livestock in the Philippines. Carole requested a PHP 17,000 loan through NWTF to buy more livestock to sell.

Carole has been in this business for two years. In the future, Carole would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more livestock to sell.

loans.name: Concelle

texts.en:
Concelle is 36 years old, married, and has two children who attend school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Concelle operates a general store in the Philippines, which she has been doing for 15 years. 

Concelle requested a loan from NWTF for 17,000 PHP, which she will use to purchase additional groceries to sell. In the future, she would like to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase additional groceries to sell

loans.name: Riza

texts.en:
Riza is a hardworking entrepreneur with eight children, three of whom are in school.

She earns a living by farming flowers in the Philippines. She is borrowing PHP 25,000 through NWTF to buy fertilizers as well as a flower pot and other farm supplies.

Riza supplements this income with earnings from farming vegetables and selling charcoal.

She has successfully paid back her previous loan, and now she has requested an additional loan to further build her business.
